text_he: משמנה הרביעי ירמיה החמשי | Mashmannah the fourth Jeremiah the fifth | ויהי מדי-בוא המלך בית יהוה באו הרצים ונשאום והשבום אל-תא הרצים | And it was so that as oft as the king entered into the house of the LORD the guard came and bore them and brought them back into the guard-chamber
text_en: Mashmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth;
text_pisuk: מִשְׁמַנָּה, הָרְבִיעִי, יִרְמְיָה, הַחֲמִשִׁי. | Mashmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth; | וַיְהִי מִדֵּי-בוֹא הַמֶּלֶךְ, בֵּית יְהוָה, בָּאוּ הָרָצִים וּנְשָׂאוּם, וֶהֱשִׁבוּם אֶל-תָּא הָרָצִים. | And it was so, that as oft as the king entered into the house of the LORD, the guard came and bore them, and brought them back into the guard-chamber.

text_he: עתי השי אליאל השבעי | Attai the sixth Eliel the seventh | ובהכנעו שב מנו אף-יהוה ולא להשחית לכלה וגם ביהודה היה דברים טובים | And when he humbled himself the anger of the LORD turned from him that He would not destroy him altogether and moreover in Judah there were good things found{S}
text_en: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh;
text_pisuk: עַתַּי, הַשִּׁשִּׁי, אֱלִיאֵל, הַשְּׁבִעִי. | Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh; | וּבְהִכָּנְעוֹ, שָׁב מִמֶּנּוּ אַף-יְהוָה, וְלֹא לְהַשְׁחִית, לְכָלָה; וְגַם, בִּיהוּדָה, הָיָה, דְּבָרִים טוֹבִים. | And when he humbled himself, the anger of the LORD turned from him, that He would not destroy him altogether; and moreover in Judah there were good things found.{S}

text_he: יוחנן השמיני אלזבד התשיעי | Johanan the eighth Elzabad the ninth | ויתחזק המלך רחבעם בירושלם--וימלך כי בן-ארבעים ואחת שנה רחבעם במלכו ושבע עשרה שנה מלך בירושלם העיר אשר-בחר יהוה לשום את-שמו שם מכל שבטי ישראל ושם אמו נעמה העמנית | So king Rehoboam strengthened himself in Jerusalem and reigned for Rehoboam was forty and one years old when he began to reign and he reigned seventeen years in Jerusalem the city which the LORD had chosen out of all the tribes of Israel to put His name there and his mother's name was Naamah the Ammonitess
text_en: Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth;
text_pisuk: יוֹחָנָן, הַשְּׁמִינִי, אֶלְזָבָד, הַתְּשִׁיעִי. | Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth; | וַיִּתְחַזֵּק הַמֶּלֶךְ רְחַבְעָם, בִּירוּשָׁלִַם--וַיִּמְלֹךְ: כִּי בֶן-אַרְבָּעִים וְאַחַת שָׁנָה רְחַבְעָם בְּמָלְכוֹ וּשְׁבַע עֶשְׂרֵה שָׁנָה מָלַךְ בִּירוּשָׁלִַם, הָעִיר אֲשֶׁר-בָּחַר יְהוָה לָשׂוּם אֶת-שְׁמוֹ שָׁם מִכֹּל שִׁבְטֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְשֵׁם אִמּוֹ, נַעֲמָה הָעַמֹּנִית. | So king Rehoboam strengthened himself in Jerusalem, and reigned; for Rehoboam was forty and one years old when he began to reign, and he reigned seventeen years in Jerusalem, the city which the LORD had chosen out of all the tribes of Israel, to put His name there; and his mother's name was Naamah the Ammonitess.

text_he: ירמיהו העשירי מכבני עשתי עשר | Jeremiah the tenth Machbannai the eleventh{S} | ויעש הרע כי לא הכין לבו לדרוש את-יהוה | And he did that which was evil because he set not his heart to seek the LORD{S}
text_en: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbannai the eleventh.{S}
text_pisuk: יִרְמְיָהוּ, הָעֲשִׂירִי, מַכְבַּנַּי, עַשְׁתֵּי עָשָׂר. | Jeremiah the tenth, Machbannai the eleventh.{S} | וַיַּעַשׂ, הָרָע: כִּי לֹא הֵכִין לִבּוֹ, לִדְרוֹשׁ אֶת-יְהוָה. | And he did that which was evil, because he set not his heart to seek the LORD.{S}

text_he: אלה מבני-גד ראשי הצבא אחד למאה הקטן והגדול לאלף | These of the sons of Gad were captains of the host he that was least was equal to a hundred and the greatest to a thousand | ודברי רחבעם הראשנים והאחרונים--הלא-הם כתובים בדברי שמעיה הנביא ועדו החזה להתיחש ומלחמות רחבעם וירבעם כל-הימים | Now the acts of Rehoboam first and last are they not written in the histories of Shemaiah the prophet and of Iddo the seer after the manner of genealogies And there were wars between Rehoboam and Jeroboam continually
text_en: These of the sons of Gad were captains of the host; he that was least was equal to a hundred, and the greatest to a thousand.
text_pisuk: אֵלֶּה מִבְּנֵי-גָד, רָאשֵׁי הַצָּבָא; אֶחָד לְמֵאָה הַקָּטָן, וְהַגָּדוֹל לְאָלֶף. | These of the sons of Gad were captains of the host; he that was least was equal to a hundred, and the greatest to a thousand. | וְדִבְרֵי רְחַבְעָם, הָרִאשֹׁנִים וְהָאַחֲרוֹנִים--הֲלֹא-הֵם כְּתוּבִים בְּדִבְרֵי שְׁמַעְיָה הַנָּבִיא וְעִדּוֹ הַחֹזֶה, לְהִתְיַחֵשׂ; וּמִלְחֲמוֹת רְחַבְעָם וְיָרָבְעָם, כָּל-הַיָּמִים. | Now the acts of Rehoboam, first and last, are they not written in the histories of Shemaiah the prophet and of Iddo the seer, after the manner of genealogies? And there were wars between Rehoboam and Jeroboam continually.

text_he: אלה הם אשר עברו את-הירדן בחדש הראשון והוא מלא על-כל-גדיתיו (גדותיו) ויבריחו את-כל-העמקים למזרח ולמערב | These are they that went over the Jordan in the first month when it had overflown all its banks and they put to flight all them of the valleys both toward the east and toward the west | וישכב רחבעם עם-אבתיו ויקבר בעיר דויד וימלך אביה בנו תחתיו | And Rehoboam slept with his fathers and was buried in the city of David and Abijah his son reigned in his stead
text_en: These are they that went over the Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all its banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.
text_pisuk: אֵלֶּה הֵם, אֲשֶׁר עָבְרוּ אֶת-הַיַּרְדֵּן בַּחֹדֶשׁ הָרִאשׁוֹן, וְהוּא מְמַלֵּא, עַל-כָּל-גדיתיו (גְּדוֹתָיו); וַיַּבְרִיחוּ, אֶת-כָּל-הָעֲמָקִים, לַמִּזְרָח, וְלַמַּעֲרָב. | These are they that went over the Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all its banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west. | וַיִּשְׁכַּב רְחַבְעָם עִם-אֲבֹתָיו, וַיִּקָּבֵר בְּעִיר דָּוִיד; וַיִּמְלֹךְ אֲבִיָּה בְנוֹ, תַּחְתָּיו. | And Rehoboam slept with his fathers, and was buried in the city of David; and Abijah his son reigned in his stead.

text_he: ויבאו מן-בני בנימן ויהודה עד-למצד לדויד
text_en: And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the stronghold unto David.
text_pisuk: וַיָּבֹאוּ, מִן-בְּנֵי בִנְיָמִן וִיהוּדָה, עַד-לַמְצָד, לְדָוִיד.

text_he: ויצא דויד לפניהם ויען ויאמר להם אם-לשלום באתם אלי לעזרני יהיה-לי עליכם לב ליחד ואם-לרמותני לצרי בלא חמס בכפי ירא אלהי אבותינו ויוכח
text_en: And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them: 'If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, my heart shall be knit unto you; but if ye be come to betray me to mine adversaries, seeing there is no wrong in my hands, the God of our fathers look thereon, and give judgment.'{S}
text_pisuk: וַיֵּצֵא דָוִיד, לִפְנֵיהֶם, וַיַּעַן וַיֹּאמֶר לָהֶם, אִם-לְשָׁלוֹם בָּאתֶם אֵלַי לְעָזְרֵנִי יִהְיֶה-לִּי עֲלֵיכֶם לֵבָב לְיָחַד; וְאִם-לְרַמּוֹתַנִי לְצָרַי, בְּלֹא חָמָס בְּכַפַּי, יֵרֶא אֱלֹהֵי אֲבוֹתֵינוּ, וְיוֹכַח.

text_he: ורוח לבשה את-עמשי ראש השלושים (השלישים) לך דויד ועמך בן-ישי שלום שלום לך ושלום לעזרך כי עזרך אלהיך ויקבלם דויד ויתנם בראשי הגדוד
text_en: Then the spirit clothed Amasai, who was chief of the captains: Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse; peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thy helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.
text_pisuk: וְרוּחַ לָבְשָׁה, אֶת-עֲמָשַׂי רֹאשׁ השלושים (הַשָּׁלִישִׁים), לְךָ דָוִיד וְעִמְּךָ בֶן-יִשַׁי, שָׁלוֹם שָׁלוֹם לְךָ וְשָׁלוֹם לְעֹזְרֶךָ כִּי עֲזָרְךָ אֱלֹהֶיךָ; וַיְקַבְּלֵם דָּוִיד, וַיִּתְּנֵם בְּרָאשֵׁי הַגְּדוּד.

text_he: ומנשה נפלו על-דויד באו עם-פלשתים על-שאול למלחמה--ולא עזרם כי בעצה שלחהו סרני פלשתים לאמר בראשינו יפול אל-אדניו שאול
text_en: Of Manasseh also there fell away some to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle, but they helped them not; for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying: 'He will fall away to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads.'
text_pisuk: וּמִמְּנַשֶּׁה נָפְלוּ עַל-דָּוִיד, בְּבֹאוֹ עִם-פְּלִשְׁתִּים עַל-שָׁאוּל לַמִּלְחָמָה--וְלֹא עֲזָרֻם: כִּי בְעֵצָה, שִׁלְּחֻהוּ סַרְנֵי פְלִשְׁתִּים לֵאמֹר, בְּרָאשֵׁינוּ, יִפּוֹל אֶל-אֲדֹנָיו שָׁאוּל.

text_he: בלכתו אל-ציקלג נפלו עליו מנשה עדנח ויוזבד וידיעאל ומיכאל ויוזבד ואליהוא וצלתי ראשי האלפים אשר למנשה
text_en: As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zillethai, captains of thousands that were of Manasseh.
text_pisuk: בְּלֶכְתּוֹ אֶל-צִיקְלַג, נָפְלוּ עָלָיו מִמְּנַשֶּׁה עַדְנַח וְיוֹזָבָד וִידִיעֲאֵל וּמִיכָאֵל וְיוֹזָבָד, וֶאֱלִיהוּא, וְצִלְּתָי: רָאשֵׁי הָאֲלָפִים, אֲשֶׁר לִמְנַשֶּׁה.

text_he: והמה עזרו עם-דויד על-הגדוד כי-גבורי חיל כלם ויהיו שרים בצבא
text_en: And they helped David against the troop, for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.
text_pisuk: וְהֵמָּה, עָזְרוּ עִם-דָּוִיד עַל-הַגְּדוּד, כִּי-גִבּוֹרֵי חַיִל, כֻּלָּם; וַיִּהְיוּ שָׂרִים, בַּצָּבָא.

text_he: כי לעת-יום ביום יבאו על-דויד לעזרו--עד-למחנה גדול כמחנה אלהים
text_en: For from day to day men came to David to help him, until there was a great host, like the host of God.
text_pisuk: כִּי לְעֶת-יוֹם בְּיוֹם, יָבֹאוּ עַל-דָּוִיד לְעָזְרוֹ--עַד-לְמַחֲנֶה גָדוֹל, כְּמַחֲנֵה אֱלֹהִים.

text_he: ואלה מספרי ראשי החלוץ לצבא באו על-דויד חברונה להסב מלכות שאול אליו--כפי יהוה
text_en: And these are the numbers of the heads of them that were armed for war, who came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the LORD.{S}
text_pisuk: וְאֵלֶּה מִסְפְּרֵי רָאשֵׁי הֶחָלוּץ, לַצָּבָא, בָּאוּ עַל-דָּוִיד, חֶבְרוֹנָה: לְהָסֵב מַלְכוּת שָׁאוּל, אֵלָיו--כְּפִי יְהוָה.

text_he: בני יהודה נשאי צנה ורמח--שת אלפים ושמונה מאות חלוצי צבא
text_en: The children of Judah that bore shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, armed for war.{S}
text_pisuk: בְּנֵי יְהוּדָה, נֹשְׂאֵי צִנָּה וָרֹמַח--שֵׁשֶׁת אֲלָפִים וּשְׁמוֹנֶה מֵאוֹת, חֲלוּצֵי צָבָא.

text_he: מן-בני שמעון גבורי חיל לצבא--שבעת אלפים ומאה
text_en: Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.{S}
text_pisuk: מִן-בְּנֵי שִׁמְעוֹן, גִּבּוֹרֵי חַיִל לַצָּבָא--שִׁבְעַת אֲלָפִים, וּמֵאָה.

text_he: מן-בני הלוי--ארבעת אלפים וש מאות
text_en: Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.{S}
text_pisuk: מִן-בְּנֵי, הַלֵּוִי--אַרְבַּעַת אֲלָפִים, וְשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת.

text_he: ויהוידע הנגיד לאהרן ועמו שלשת אלפים ושבע מאות
text_en: And Jehoiada was the leader of the house of Aaron, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;{S}
text_pisuk: וִיהוֹיָדָע, הַנָּגִיד לְאַהֲרֹן; וְעִמּוֹ, שְׁלֹשֶׁת אֲלָפִים וּשְׁבַע מֵאוֹת.

text_he: וצדוק נער גבור חיל ובית-אביו שרים עשרים ושנים
text_en: and Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father's house twenty and two captains.{S}
text_pisuk: וְצָדוֹק נַעַר, גִּבּוֹר חָיִל; וּבֵית-אָבִיו שָׂרִים, עֶשְׂרִים וּשְׁנָיִם.

text_he: ומן-בני בנימן אחי שאול שלשת אלפים ועד-הנה מרביתם שמרים משמרת בית שאול
text_en: And of the children of Benjamin, the brethren of Saul, three thousand; for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept their allegiance to the house of Saul.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמִן-בְּנֵי בִנְיָמִן אֲחֵי שָׁאוּל, שְׁלֹשֶׁת אֲלָפִים; וְעַד-הֵנָּה, מַרְבִּיתָם, שֹׁמְרִים, מִשְׁמֶרֶת בֵּית שָׁאוּל.

text_he: ומן-בני אפרים עשרים אלף ושמונה מאות--גבורי חיל אנשי שמות לבית אבותם
text_en: And of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand and eight hundred, mighty men of valour, famous men in their fathers' houses.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמִן-בְּנֵי אֶפְרַיִם, עֶשְׂרִים אֶלֶף וּשְׁמוֹנֶה מֵאוֹת--גִּבּוֹרֵי חַיִל, אַנְשֵׁי שֵׁמוֹת לְבֵית אֲבוֹתָם.

text_he: ומחצי מטה מנשה שמונה עשר אלף אשר נקבו בשמות לבוא להמליך את-דויד
text_en: And of the half-tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, who were mentioned by name, to come and make David king.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמֵחֲצִי מַטֵּה מְנַשֶּׁה, שְׁמוֹנָה עָשָׂר אָלֶף, אֲשֶׁר נִקְּבוּ בְּשֵׁמוֹת, לָבוֹא לְהַמְלִיךְ אֶת-דָּוִיד.

text_he: ומבני ישכר יודעי בינה לעתים לדעת מה-יעשה ישראל--ראשיהם מאתים וכל-אחיהם על-פיהם
text_en: And of the children of Issachar, men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמִבְּנֵי יִשָּׂשכָר, יוֹדְעֵי בִינָה לַעִתִּים, לָדַעַת, מַה-יַּעֲשֶׂה יִשְׂרָאֵל--רָאשֵׁיהֶם מָאתַיִם, וְכָל-אֲחֵיהֶם עַל-פִּיהֶם.

text_he: מזבלון יוצאי צבא ערכי מלחמה בכל-כלי מלחמה--חמשים אלף ולעדר בלא-לב ולב
text_en: Of Zebulun, such as were able to go out in the host, that could set the battle in array, with all manner of instruments of war, fifty thousand; and that could order the battle array, and were not of double heart.{S}
text_pisuk: מִזְּבֻלוּן יוֹצְאֵי צָבָא, עֹרְכֵי מִלְחָמָה בְּכָל-כְּלֵי מִלְחָמָה--חֲמִשִּׁים אָלֶף: וְלַעֲדֹר, בְּלֹא-לֵב וָלֵב.

text_he: ומנפתלי שרים אלף ועמהם בצנה וחנית שלשים ושבעה אלף
text_en: And of Naphtali a thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear thirty and seven thousand.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמִנַּפְתָּלִי, שָׂרִים אָלֶף; וְעִמָּהֶם בְּצִנָּה וַחֲנִית, שְׁלֹשִׁים וְשִׁבְעָה אָלֶף.

text_he: ומן-הדני ערכי מלחמה עשרים-ושמונה אלף וש מאות
text_en: And of the Danites that could set the battle in array, twenty and eight thousand and six hundred.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמִן-הַדָּנִי עֹרְכֵי מִלְחָמָה, עֶשְׂרִים-וּשְׁמוֹנָה אֶלֶף וְשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת.

text_he: ומאשר יוצאי צבא לערך מלחמה--ארבעים אלף
text_en: And of Asher, such as were able to go out in the host, that could set the battle in array, forty thousand.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמֵאָשֵׁר, יוֹצְאֵי צָבָא לַעֲרֹךְ מִלְחָמָה--אַרְבָּעִים אָלֶף.

text_he: ומעבר לירדן מן-הראובני והגדי וחצי שבט מנשה בכל כלי צבא מלחמה--מאה ועשרים אלף
text_en: And on the other side of the Jordan, of the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and of the half-tribe of Manasseh, with all manner of instruments of war for the battle, a hundred and twenty thousand.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמֵעֵבֶר לַיַּרְדֵּן מִן-הָראוּבֵנִי וְהַגָּדִי וַחֲצִי שֵׁבֶט מְנַשֶּׁה, בְּכֹל כְּלֵי צְבָא מִלְחָמָה--מֵאָה וְעֶשְׂרִים, אָלֶף.

text_he: כל-אלה אנשי מלחמה עדרי מערכה בלב שלם באו חברונה להמליך את-דויד על-כל-ישראל וגם כל-שרית ישראל לב אחד--להמליך את-דויד
text_en: All these, being men of war, that could order the battle array, came with a whole heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel; and all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.
text_pisuk: כָּל-אֵלֶּה אַנְשֵׁי מִלְחָמָה, עֹדְרֵי מַעֲרָכָה, בְּלֵבָב שָׁלֵם בָּאוּ חֶבְרוֹנָה, לְהַמְלִיךְ אֶת-דָּוִיד עַל-כָּל-יִשְׂרָאֵל; וְגַם כָּל-שֵׁרִית יִשְׂרָאֵל, לֵב אֶחָד--לְהַמְלִיךְ אֶת-דָּוִיד.

text_he: ויהיו-שם עם-דויד ימים שלושה אכלים ושותים כי-הכינו להם אחיהם
text_en: And they were there with David three days, eating and drinking; for their brethren had made preparation for them.
text_pisuk: וַיִּהְיוּ-שָׁם עִם-דָּוִיד יָמִים שְׁלוֹשָׁה, אֹכְלִים וְשׁוֹתִים: כִּי-הֵכִינוּ לָהֶם, אֲחֵיהֶם.

text_he: וגם הקרובים-אליהם עד-ישכר וזבלון ונפתלי מביאים לחם בחמורים ובגמלים ובפרדים ובקר מאכל קמח דבלים וצמוקים וין-ושמן ובקר וצאן--לרב כי שמחה בישראל
text_en: Moreover they that were nigh unto them, even as far as Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, victual of meal, cakes of figs, and clusters of raisins, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep in abundance; for there was joy in Israel.
text_pisuk: וְגַם הַקְּרוֹבִים-אֲלֵיהֶם עַד-יִשָּׂשכָר וּזְבֻלוּן וְנַפְתָּלִי, מְבִיאִים לֶחֶם בַּחֲמוֹרִים וּבַגְּמַלִּים וּבַפְּרָדִים וּבַבָּקָר מַאֲכָל קֶמַח דְּבֵלִים וְצִמּוּקִים וְיַיִן-וְשֶׁמֶן וּבָקָר וְצֹאן--לָרֹב: כִּי שִׂמְחָה, בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל.

text_he: ויועץ דויד עם-שרי האלפים והמאות--לכל-נגיד | And David consulted with the captains of thousands and of hundreds even with every leader | בשנת שמונה עשרה למלך ירבעם וימלך אביה על-יהודה | In the eighteenth year of king Jeroboam began Abijah to reign over Judah
text_en: And David consulted with the captains of thousands and of hundreds, even with every leader.
text_pisuk: וַיִּוָּעַץ דָּוִיד, עִם-שָׂרֵי הָאֲלָפִים וְהַמֵּאוֹת--לְכָל-נָגִיד. | And David consulted with the captains of thousands and of hundreds, even with every leader. | בִּשְׁנַת שְׁמוֹנֶה עֶשְׂרֵה, לַמֶּלֶךְ יָרָבְעָם; וַיִּמְלֹךְ אֲבִיָּה, עַל-יְהוּדָה. | In the eighteenth year of king Jeroboam began Abijah to reign over Judah.

text_he: ויאמר דויד לכל קהל ישראל אם-עליכם טוב ומן-יהוה אלהינו נפרצה נשלחה על-אחינו הנשארים בכל ארצות ישראל ועמהם הכהנים והלוים בערי מגרשיהם ויקבצו אלינו | And David said unto all the assembly of Israel 'If it seem good unto you and if it be of the LORD our God let us send abroad everywhere unto our brethren that are left in all the land of Israel and with them to the priests and Levites that are in their cities that have open land about them that they may gather themselves unto us | שלוש שנים מלך בירושלם ושם אמו מיכיהו בת-אוריאל מן-גבעה ומלחמה היתה בין אביה ובין ירבעם | Three years reigned he in Jerusalem and his mother's name was Micaiah the daughter of Uriel of Gibeah And there was war between Abijah and Jeroboam
text_en: And David said unto all the assembly of Israel: 'If it seem good unto you, and if it be of the LORD our God, let us send abroad everywhere unto our brethren that are left in all the land of Israel, and with them to the priests and Levites that are in their cities that have open land about them, that they may gather themselves unto us;
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד לְכֹל קְהַל יִשְׂרָאֵל, אִם-עֲלֵיכֶם טוֹב וּמִן-יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ נִפְרְצָה נִשְׁלְחָה עַל-אַחֵינוּ הַנִּשְׁאָרִים בְּכֹל אַרְצוֹת יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְעִמָּהֶם הַכֹּהֲנִים וְהַלְוִיִּם, בְּעָרֵי מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶם; וְיִקָּבְצוּ, אֵלֵינוּ. | And David said unto all the assembly of Israel: 'If it seem good unto you, and if it be of the LORD our God, let us send abroad everywhere unto our brethren that are left in all the land of Israel, and with them to the priests and Levites that are in their cities that have open land about them, that they may gather themselves unto us; | שָׁלוֹשׁ שָׁנִים, מָלַךְ בִּירוּשָׁלִַם, וְשֵׁם אִמּוֹ, מִיכָיָהוּ בַת-אוּרִיאֵל מִן-גִּבְעָה; וּמִלְחָמָה הָיְתָה בֵּין אֲבִיָּה, וּבֵין יָרָבְעָם. | Three years reigned he in Jerusalem; and his mother's name was Micaiah the daughter of Uriel of Gibeah. And there was war between Abijah and Jeroboam.

text_he: ונסבה את-ארון אלהינו אלינו כי-לא דרשנהו בימי שאול | and let us bring back the ark of our God to us for we sought not unto it in the days of Saul' | ויאסר אביה את-המלחמה בחיל גבורי מלחמה ארבע-מאות אלף איש בחור וירבעם ערך עמו מלחמה בשמונה מאות אלף איש בחור גבור חיל | And Abijah joined battle with an army of valiant men of war even four hundred thousand chosen men{S}and Jeroboam set the battle in array against him with eight hundred thousand chosen men who were mighty men of valour{S}
text_en: and let us bring back the ark of our God to us; for we sought not unto it in the days of Saul.'
text_pisuk: וְנָסֵבָּה אֶת-אֲרוֹן אֱלֹהֵינוּ, אֵלֵינוּ: כִּי-לֹא דְרַשְׁנֻהוּ, בִּימֵי שָׁאוּל. | and let us bring back the ark of our God to us; for we sought not unto it in the days of Saul.' | וַיֶּאְסֹר אֲבִיָּה אֶת-הַמִּלְחָמָה, בְּחַיִל גִּבּוֹרֵי מִלְחָמָה, אַרְבַּע-מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף, אִישׁ בָּחוּר;  וְיָרָבְעָם, עָרַךְ עִמּוֹ מִלְחָמָה, בִּשְׁמוֹנֶה מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף אִישׁ בָּחוּר, גִּבּוֹר חָיִל. | And Abijah joined battle with an army of valiant men of war, even four hundred thousand chosen men;{S}and Jeroboam set the battle in array against him with eight hundred thousand chosen men, who were mighty men of valour.{S}

text_he: ויאמרו כל-הקהל לעשות כן כי-ישר הדבר בעיני כל-העם | And all the assembly said that they would do so for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people | ויקם אביה מעל להר צמרים אשר בהר אפרים ויאמר שמעוני ירבעם וכל-ישראל | And Abijah stood up upon mount Zemaraim which is in the hill-country of Ephraim and said 'Hear me O Jeroboam and all Israel
text_en: And all the assembly said that they would do so; for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמְרוּ כָל-הַקָּהָל, לַעֲשׂוֹת כֵּן: כִּי-יָשַׁר הַדָּבָר, בְּעֵינֵי כָל-הָעָם. | And all the assembly said that they would do so; for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people. | וַיָּקָם אֲבִיָּה, מֵעַל לְהַר צְמָרַיִם, אֲשֶׁר, בְּהַר אֶפְרָיִם; וַיֹּאמֶר, שְׁמָעוּנִי יָרָבְעָם וְכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And Abijah stood up upon mount Zemaraim, which is in the hill-country of Ephraim, and said: 'Hear me, O Jeroboam and all Israel;

text_he: ויקהל דויד את-כל-ישראל מן-שיחור מצרים ועד-לבוא חמת להביא את-ארון האלהים מקרית יערים | So David assembled all Israel together from Shihor the brook of Egypt even unto the entrance of Hamath to bring the ark of God from Kiriath-jearim | הלא לכם לדעת כי יהוה אלהי ישראל נתן מלכה לדויד על-ישראל לעולם לו ולבניו ברית מלח | ought ye not to know that the LORD the God of Israel gave the kingdom over Israel to David for ever even to him and to his sons by a covenant of salt
text_en: So David assembled all Israel together, from Shihor the brook of Egypt even unto the entrance of Hamath, to bring the ark of God from Kiriath-jearim.
text_pisuk: וַיַּקְהֵל דָּוִיד אֶת-כָּל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, מִן-שִׁיחוֹר מִצְרַיִם וְעַד-לְבוֹא חֲמָת, לְהָבִיא אֶת-אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים, מִקִּרְיַת יְעָרִים. | So David assembled all Israel together, from Shihor the brook of Egypt even unto the entrance of Hamath, to bring the ark of God from Kiriath-jearim. | הֲלֹא לָכֶם, לָדַעַת, כִּי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל נָתַן מַמְלָכָה לְדָוִיד עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, לְעוֹלָם: לוֹ וּלְבָנָיו, בְּרִית מֶלַח. | ought ye not to know that the LORD, the God of Israel, gave the kingdom over Israel to David for ever, even to him and to his sons by a covenant of salt?

text_he: ויעל דויד וכל-ישראל בעלתה אל-קרית יערים אשר ליהודה להעלות משם את ארון האלהים יהוה יושב הכרובים--אשר-נקרא שם | And David went up and all Israel to Baalah that is to Kiriath-jearim which belonged to Judah to bring up from thence the ark of God the LORD that sitteth upon the cherubim whereon is called the Name | ויקם ירבעם בן-נבט עבד שלמה בן-דויד וימרד על-אדניו | Yet Jeroboam the son of Nebat the servant of Solomon the son of David rose up and rebelled against his lord
text_en: And David went up, and all Israel, to Baalah, that is, to Kiriath-jearim, which belonged to Judah, to bring up from thence the ark of God, the LORD that sitteth upon the cherubim, whereon is called the Name.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַל דָּוִיד וְכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל בַּעֲלָתָה, אֶל-קִרְיַת יְעָרִים אֲשֶׁר לִיהוּדָה: לְהַעֲלוֹת מִשָּׁם, אֵת אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים יְהוָה יוֹשֵׁב הַכְּרוּבִים--אֲשֶׁר-נִקְרָא שֵׁם. | And David went up, and all Israel, to Baalah, that is, to Kiriath-jearim, which belonged to Judah, to bring up from thence the ark of God, the LORD that sitteth upon the cherubim, whereon is called the Name. | וַיָּקָם יָרָבְעָם בֶּן-נְבָט, עֶבֶד שְׁלֹמֹה בֶן-דָּוִיד; וַיִּמְרֹד, עַל-אֲדֹנָיו. | Yet Jeroboam the son of Nebat, the servant of Solomon the son of David, rose up, and rebelled against his lord.

text_he: וירכיבו את-ארון האלהים על-עגלה חדשה מבית אבינדב ועזא ואחיו נהגים בעגלה | And they set the ark of God upon a new cart out of the house of Abinadab and Uzza and Ahio drove the cart | ויקבצו עליו אנשים רקים בני בליעל ויתאמצו על-רחבעם בן-שלמה ורחבעם היה נער ורך-לב ולא התחזק לפניהם | And there were gathered unto him vain men base fellows that strengthened themselves against Rehoboam the son of Solomon when Rehoboam was young and faint-hearted and could not withstand them
text_en: And they set the ark of God upon a new cart, out of the house of Abinadab; and Uzza and Ahio drove the cart.
text_pisuk: וַיַּרְכִּיבוּ אֶת-אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים, עַל-עֲגָלָה חֲדָשָׁה, מִבֵּית, אֲבִינָדָב; וְעֻזָּא וְאַחְיוֹ, נֹהֲגִים בָּעֲגָלָה. | And they set the ark of God upon a new cart, out of the house of Abinadab; and Uzza and Ahio drove the cart. | וַיִּקָּבְצוּ עָלָיו, אֲנָשִׁים רֵקִים בְּנֵי בְלִיַּעַל, וַיִּתְאַמְּצוּ, עַל-רְחַבְעָם בֶּן-שְׁלֹמֹה; וּרְחַבְעָם, הָיָה נַעַר וְרַךְ-לֵבָב, וְלֹא הִתְחַזַּק, לִפְנֵיהֶם. | And there were gathered unto him vain men, base fellows that strengthened themselves against Rehoboam the son of Solomon, when Rehoboam was young and faint-hearted, and could not withstand them.

text_he: ודויד וכל-ישראל משחקים לפני האלהים--בכל-עז ובשירים ובכנרות ובנבלים ובתפים ובמצלתים ובחצרות | And David and all Israel played before God with all their might even with songs and with harps and with psalteries and with timbrels and with cymbals and with trumpets | ועתה אתם אמרים להתחזק לפני מלכת יהוה ביד בני דויד ואתם המון רב ועמכם עגלי זהב אשר עשה לכם ירבעם לאלהים | And now ye think to withstand the kingdom of the LORD in the hand of the sons of David and ye are a great multitude and there are with you the golden calves which Jeroboam made you for gods
text_en: And David and all Israel played before God with all their might; even with songs, and with harps, and with psalteries, and with timbrels, and with cymbals, and with trumpets.
text_pisuk: וְדָוִיד וְכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, מְשַׂחֲקִים לִפְנֵי הָאֱלֹהִים--בְּכָל-עֹז; וּבְשִׁירִים וּבְכִנֹּרוֹת וּבִנְבָלִים וּבְתֻפִּים, וּבִמְצִלְתַּיִם וּבַחֲצֹצְרוֹת. | And David and all Israel played before God with all their might; even with songs, and with harps, and with psalteries, and with timbrels, and with cymbals, and with trumpets. | וְעַתָּה אַתֶּם אֹמְרִים, לְהִתְחַזֵּק לִפְנֵי מַמְלֶכֶת יְהוָה, בְּיַד, בְּנֵי דָוִיד; וְאַתֶּם, הָמוֹן רָב, וְעִמָּכֶם עֶגְלֵי זָהָב, אֲשֶׁר עָשָׂה לָכֶם יָרָבְעָם לֵאלֹהִים. | And now ye think to withstand the kingdom of the LORD in the hand of the sons of David; and ye are a great multitude, and there are with you the golden calves which Jeroboam made you for gods.

text_he: ויבאו עד-גרן כידן וישלח עזא את-ידו לאחז את-הארון--כי שמטו הבקר | And when they came unto the threshing-floor of Chidon Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark for the oxen stumbled | הלא הדחתם את-כהני יהוה את-בני אהרן והלוים ותעשו לכם כהנים כעמי הארצות--כל-הבא למלא ידו בפר בן-בקר ואילם שבעה והיה כהן לא אלהים | Have ye not driven out the priests of the LORD the sons of Aaron and the Levites and have made you priests after the manner of the peoples of other lands so that whosoever cometh to consecrate himself with a young bullock and seven rams the same becometh a priest of them that are no gods{S}
text_en: And when they came unto the threshing-floor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark; for the oxen stumbled.
text_pisuk: וַיָּבֹאוּ, עַד-גֹּרֶן כִּידֹן; וַיִּשְׁלַח עֻזָּא אֶת-יָדוֹ, לֶאֱחֹז אֶת-הָאָרוֹן--כִּי שָׁמְטוּ, הַבָּקָר. | And when they came unto the threshing-floor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark; for the oxen stumbled. | הֲלֹא הִדַּחְתֶּם אֶת-כֹּהֲנֵי יְהוָה, אֶת-בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן וְהַלְוִיִּם; וַתַּעֲשׂוּ לָכֶם כֹּהֲנִים, כְּעַמֵּי הָאֲרָצוֹת--כָּל-הַבָּא לְמַלֵּא יָדוֹ בְּפַר בֶּן-בָּקָר וְאֵילִם שִׁבְעָה, וְהָיָה כֹהֵן לְלֹא אֱלֹהִים. | Have ye not driven out the priests of the LORD, the sons of Aaron, and the Levites, and have made you priests after the manner of the peoples of other lands? so that whosoever cometh to consecrate himself with a young bullock and seven rams, the same becometh a priest of them that are no gods.{S}

text_he: ויחר-אף יהוה בעזא ויכהו על אשר-שלח ידו על-הארון וימת שם לפני אלהים | And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza and He smote him because he put forth his hand to the ark and there he died before God | ואנחנו יהוה אלהינו ולא עזבנהו וכהנים משרתים ליהוה בני אהרן והלוים במלאכת | But as for us the LORD is our God and we have not forsaken Him and we have priests ministering unto the LORD the sons of Aaron and the Levites in their work
text_en: And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza, and He smote him, because he put forth his hand to the ark; and there he died before God.
text_pisuk: וַיִּחַר-אַף יְהוָה, בְּעֻזָּא, וַיַּכֵּהוּ, עַל אֲשֶׁר-שָׁלַח יָדוֹ עַל-הָאָרוֹן; וַיָּמָת שָׁם, לִפְנֵי אֱלֹהִים. | And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza, and He smote him, because he put forth his hand to the ark; and there he died before God. | וַאֲנַחְנוּ יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ, וְלֹא עֲזַבְנֻהוּ; וְכֹהֲנִים מְשָׁרְתִים לַיהוָה, בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן, וְהַלְוִיִּם, בַּמְלָאכֶת. | But as for us, the LORD is our God, and we have not forsaken Him; and we have priests ministering unto the LORD, the sons of Aaron, and the Levites in their work;

text_he: ויחר לדויד כי-פרץ יהוה פרץ בעזא ויקרא למקום הוא פרץ עזא עד היום הזה | And David was displeased because the LORD had broken forth upon Uzza and that place was called Perez-uzza unto this day | ומקטרים ליהוה עלות בקר-בקר ובערב-בערב וקטרת-סמים ומערכת לחם על-השלחן הטהור ומנורת הזהב ונרתיה לבער בערב בערב--כי-שמרים אנחנו את-משמרת יהוה אלהינו ואתם עזבתם אתו | and they burn unto the LORD every morning and every evening burnt-offerings and sweet incense the showbread also set they in order upon the pure table and the candlestick of gold with the lamps thereof to burn every evening for we keep the charge of the LORD our God but ye have forsaken Him
text_en: And David was displeased, because the LORD had broken forth upon Uzza; and that place was called Perez-uzza unto this day.
text_pisuk: וַיִּחַר לְדָוִיד, כִּי-פָרַץ יְהוָה פֶּרֶץ בְּעֻזָּא; וַיִּקְרָא לַמָּקוֹם הַהוּא, פֶּרֶץ עֻזָּא, עַד, הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה. | And David was displeased, because the LORD had broken forth upon Uzza; and that place was called Perez-uzza unto this day. | וּמַקְטִרִים לַיהוָה עֹלוֹת בַּבֹּקֶר-בַּבֹּקֶר וּבָעֶרֶב-בָּעֶרֶב וּקְטֹרֶת-סַמִּים וּמַעֲרֶכֶת לֶחֶם עַל-הַשֻּׁלְחָן הַטָּהוֹר, וּמְנוֹרַת הַזָּהָב וְנֵרֹתֶיהָ לְבָעֵר בָּעֶרֶב בָּעֶרֶב--כִּי-שֹׁמְרִים אֲנַחְנוּ, אֶת-מִשְׁמֶרֶת יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ; וְאַתֶּם, עֲזַבְתֶּם אֹתוֹ. | and they burn unto the LORD every morning and every evening burnt-offerings and sweet incense; the showbread also set they in order upon the pure table; and the candlestick of gold with the lamps thereof, to burn every evening; for we keep the charge of the LORD our God; but ye have forsaken Him.

text_he: וירא דויד את-האלהים ביום הוא לאמר היך אביא אלי את ארון האלהים | And David was afraid of God that day saying 'How shall I bring the ark of God home to me' | והנה עמנו בראש האלהים וכהניו וחצרות התרועה--להריע עליכם בני ישראל אל-תלחמו עם-יהוה אלהי-אבתיכם--כי-לא תצליחו | And behold God is with us at our head and His priests with the trumpets of alarm to sound an alarm against you O children of Israel fight ye not against the LORD the God of your fathers for ye shall not prosper'
text_en: And David was afraid of God that day, saying: 'How shall I bring the ark of God home to me?'
text_pisuk: וַיִּירָא דָוִיד אֶת-הָאֱלֹהִים, בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא לֵאמֹר: הֵיךְ אָבִיא אֵלַי, אֵת אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים. | And David was afraid of God that day, saying: 'How shall I bring the ark of God home to me?' | וְהִנֵּה עִמָּנוּ בָרֹאשׁ הָאֱלֹהִים וְכֹהֲנָיו, וַחֲצֹצְרוֹת הַתְּרוּעָה--לְהָרִיעַ עֲלֵיכֶם; בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, אַל-תִּלָּחֲמוּ עִם-יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי-אֲבֹתֵיכֶם--כִּי-לֹא תַצְלִיחוּ. | And, behold, God is with us at our head, and His priests with the trumpets of alarm to sound an alarm against you. O children of Israel, fight ye not against the LORD, the God of your fathers; for ye shall not prosper.'

text_he: ולא-הסיר דויד את-הארון אליו אל-עיר דויד ויטהו אל-בית עבד-אדם הגתי | So David removed not the ark unto him into the city of David but carried it aside into the house of Obed-edom the Gittite | וירבעם הסב את-המארב לבוא מאחריהם ויהיו לפני יהודה והמארב מאחריהם | But Jeroboam caused an ambushment to come about behind them so they were before Judah and the ambushment was behind them
text_en: So David removed not the ark unto him into the city of David, but carried it aside into the house of Obed-edom the Gittite.
text_pisuk: וְלֹא-הֵסִיר דָּוִיד אֶת-הָאָרוֹן אֵלָיו, אֶל-עִיר דָּוִיד; וַיַּטֵּהוּ, אֶל-בֵּית עֹבֵד-אֱדֹם הַגִּתִּי. | So David removed not the ark unto him into the city of David, but carried it aside into the house of Obed-edom the Gittite. | וְיָרָבְעָם, הֵסֵב אֶת-הַמַּאְרָב, לָבוֹא, מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶם; וַיִּהְיוּ לִפְנֵי יְהוּדָה, וְהַמַּאְרָב מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶם. | But Jeroboam caused an ambushment to come about behind them; so they were before Judah, and the ambushment was behind them.

text_he: וישב ארון האלהים עם-בית עבד אדם ביתו--שלשה חדשים ויברך יהוה את-בית עבד-אדם ואת-כל-אשר-לו | And the ark of God remained with the family of Obed-edom in his house three months and the LORD blessed the house of Obed-edom and all that he had{S} | ויפנו יהודה והנה להם המלחמה פנים ואחור ויצעקו ליהוה והכהנים מחצרים (מחצרים) בחצרות | And when Judah looked back behold the battle was before and behind them and they cried unto the LORD and the priests sounded with the trumpets
text_en: And the ark of God remained with the family of Obed-edom in his house three months; and the LORD blessed the house of Obed-edom, and all that he had.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיֵּשֶׁב אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים עִם-בֵּית עֹבֵד אֱדֹם, בְּבֵיתוֹ--שְׁלֹשָׁה חֳדָשִׁים; וַיְבָרֶךְ יְהוָה אֶת-בֵּית עֹבֵד-אֱדֹם, וְאֶת-כָּל-אֲשֶׁר-לוֹ. | And the ark of God remained with the family of Obed-edom in his house three months; and the LORD blessed the house of Obed-edom, and all that he had.{S} | וַיִּפְנוּ יְהוּדָה, וְהִנֵּה לָהֶם הַמִּלְחָמָה פָּנִים וְאָחוֹר, וַיִּצְעֲקוּ, לַיהוָה; וְהַכֹּהֲנִים, מחצצרים (מַחְצְרִים) בַּחֲצֹצְרוֹת. | And when Judah looked back, behold, the battle was before and behind them; and they cried unto the LORD, and the priests sounded with the trumpets.

text_he: וישלח חירם (חורם) מלך-צר מלאכים אל-דויד ועצי ארזים וחרשי קיר וחרשי עצים--לבנות לו בית | And Huram king of Tyre sent messengers to David and cedar-trees and masons and carpenters to build him a house | ויעש אסא הטוב והישר בעיני יהוה אלהיו | And Asa did that which was good and right in the eyes of the LORD his God
text_en: And Huram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and cedar-trees, and masons, and carpenters, to build him a house.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁלַח חירם (חוּרָם) מֶלֶךְ-צֹר מַלְאָכִים, אֶל-דָּוִיד, וַעֲצֵי אֲרָזִים, וְחָרָשֵׁי קִיר וְחָרָשֵׁי עֵצִים--לִבְנוֹת לוֹ, בָּיִת. | And Huram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and cedar-trees, and masons, and carpenters, to build him a house. | וַיַּעַשׂ אָסָא הַטּוֹב וְהַיָּשָׁר, בְּעֵינֵי יְהוָה אֱלֹהָיו. | And Asa did that which was good and right in the eyes of the LORD his God;

text_he: וידע דויד כי-הכינו יהוה למלך על-ישראל כי-נשאת למעלה מלכותו בעבור עמו ישראל | And David perceived that the LORD had established him king over Israel for his kingdom was exalted exceedingly for His people Israel's sake{S} | ויסר את-מזבחות הנכר והבמות וישבר את-המצבות ויגדע את-האשרים | for he took away the strange altars and the high places and broke down the pillars and hewed down the Asherim
text_en: And David perceived that the LORD had established him king over Israel, for his kingdom was exalted exceedingly, for His people Israel's sake.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיֵּדַע דָּוִיד, כִּי-הֱכִינוֹ יְהוָה לְמֶלֶךְ עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל: כִּי-נִשֵּׂאת לְמַעְלָה מַלְכוּתוֹ, בַּעֲבוּר עַמּוֹ יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And David perceived that the LORD had established him king over Israel, for his kingdom was exalted exceedingly, for His people Israel's sake.{S} | וַיָּסַר אֶת-מִזְבְּחוֹת הַנֵּכָר, וְהַבָּמוֹת; וַיְשַׁבֵּר, אֶת-הַמַּצֵּבוֹת, וַיְגַדַּע, אֶת-הָאֲשֵׁרִים. | for he took away the strange altars, and the high places, and broke down the pillars, and hewed down the Asherim;

text_he: ויקח דויד עוד נשים בירושלם ויולד דויד עוד בנים ובנות | And David took more wives at Jerusalem and David begot more sons and daughters | ויאמר ליהודה לדרוש את-יהוה אלהי אבותיהם--ולעשות התורה והמצוה | and commanded Judah to seek the LORD the God of their fathers and to do the law and the commandment
text_en: And David took more wives at Jerusalem; and David begot more sons and daughters.
text_pisuk: וַיִּקַּח דָּוִיד עוֹד נָשִׁים, בִּירוּשָׁלִָם; וַיּוֹלֶד דָּוִיד עוֹד, בָּנִים וּבָנוֹת. | And David took more wives at Jerusalem; and David begot more sons and daughters. | וַיֹּאמֶר, לִיהוּדָה, לִדְרוֹשׁ, אֶת-יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי אֲבוֹתֵיהֶם--וְלַעֲשׂוֹת, הַתּוֹרָה וְהַמִּצְוָה. | and commanded Judah to seek the LORD, the God of their fathers, and to do the law and the commandment.

text_he: ואלה שמות הילודים אשר היו-לו בירושלם שמוע ושוב נתן ושלמה | And these are the names of the children whom he had in Jerusalem Shammua and Shobab Nathan and Solomon | ויסר מכל-ערי יהודה את-הבמות ואת-החמנים ותשקט המלכה לפניו | Also he took away out of all the cities of Judah the high places and the sun-images and the kingdom was quiet before him
text_en: And these are the names of the children whom he had in Jerusalem: Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon;
text_pisuk: וְאֵלֶּה שְׁמוֹת הַיְלוּדִים, אֲשֶׁר הָיוּ-לוֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָם: שַׁמּוּעַ וְשׁוֹבָב, נָתָן וּשְׁלֹמֹה. | And these are the names of the children whom he had in Jerusalem: Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon; | וַיָּסַר מִכָּל-עָרֵי יְהוּדָה, אֶת-הַבָּמוֹת וְאֶת-הַחַמָּנִים; וַתִּשְׁקֹט הַמַּמְלָכָה, לְפָנָיו. | Also he took away out of all the cities of Judah the high places and the sun-images; and the kingdom was quiet before him.

text_he: ויבחר ואלישוע ואלפלט | and Ibhar and Elishua and Elpelet | ויבן ערי מצורה ביהודה כי-שקטה הארץ ואין-עמו מלחמה בשנים האלה--כי-הניח יהוה לו | And he built fortified cities in Judah for the land was quiet and he had no war in those years because the LORD had given him rest
text_en: and Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpelet;
text_pisuk: וְיִבְחָר וֶאֱלִישׁוּעַ, וְאֶלְפָּלֶט. | and Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpelet; | וַיִּבֶן עָרֵי מְצוּרָה, בִּיהוּדָה: כִּי-שָׁקְטָה הָאָרֶץ, וְאֵין-עִמּוֹ מִלְחָמָה בַּשָּׁנִים הָאֵלֶּה--כִּי-הֵנִיחַ יְהוָה, לוֹ. | And he built fortified cities in Judah; for the land was quiet, and he had no war in those years; because the LORD had given him rest.

text_he: ונגה ונפג ויפיע | and Nogah and Nepheg and Japhia | ויאמר ליהודה נבנה את-הערים האלה ונסב חומה ומגדלים דלתים ובריחים עודנו הארץ לפנינו כי דרשנו את-יהוה אלהינו דרשנו וינח לנו מסביב ויבנו ויצליחו | For he said unto Judah 'Let us build these cities and make about them walls and towers gates and bars the land is yet before us because we have sought the LORD our God we have sought Him and He hath given us rest on every side' So they built and prospered
text_en: and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia;
text_pisuk: וְנֹגַהּ וְנֶפֶג, וְיָפִיעַ. | and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia; | וַיֹּאמֶר לִיהוּדָה נִבְנֶה אֶת-הֶעָרִים הָאֵלֶּה, וְנָסֵב חוֹמָה וּמִגְדָּלִים דְּלָתַיִם וּבְרִיחִים, עוֹדֶנּוּ הָאָרֶץ לְפָנֵינוּ כִּי דָרַשְׁנוּ אֶת-יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ, דָּרַשְׁנוּ וַיָּנַח לָנוּ מִסָּבִיב; וַיִּבְנוּ, וַיַּצְלִיחוּ. | For he said unto Judah: 'Let us build these cities, and make about them walls, and towers, gates, and bars; the land is yet before us, because we have sought the LORD our God; we have sought Him, and He hath given us rest on every side.' So they built and prospered.

text_he: ואלישמע ובעלידע ואליפלט | and Elishama and Beeliada and Eliphelet | ויהי לאסא חיל נשא צנה ורמח מיהודה שלש מאות אלף ומבנימן נשאי מגן ודרכי קשת מאתים ושמונים אלף כל-אלה גבורי חיל | And Asa had an army that bore bucklers and spears out of Judah three hundred thousand{S}and out of Benjamin that bore shields and drew bows two hundred and fourscore thousand all these were mighty men of valour
text_en: and Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphelet.
text_pisuk: וֶאֱלִישָׁמָע וּבְעֶלְיָדָע, וֶאֱלִיפָלֶט. | and Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphelet. | וַיְהִי לְאָסָא, חַיִל נֹשֵׂא צִנָּה וָרֹמַח, מִיהוּדָה שְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף,  וּמִבִּנְיָמִן נֹשְׂאֵי מָגֵן וְדֹרְכֵי קֶשֶׁת מָאתַיִם וּשְׁמוֹנִים אָלֶף: כָּל-אֵלֶּה, גִּבּוֹרֵי חָיִל. | And Asa had an army that bore bucklers and spears, out of Judah three hundred thousand;{S}and out of Benjamin, that bore shields and drew bows, two hundred and fourscore thousand; all these were mighty men of valour.

text_he: וישמעו פלשתים כי-נמשח דויד למלך על-כל-ישראל ויעלו כל-פלשתים לבקש את-דויד וישמע דויד ויצא לפניהם | And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel all the Philistines went up to seek David and David heard of it and went out to meet them | ויצא אליהם זרח הכושי בחיל אלף אלפים ומרכבות שלש מאות ויבא עד-מרשה | And there came out against them Zerah the Ethiopian with an army of a thousand thousand and three hundred chariots and he came unto Mareshah
text_en: And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David; and David heard of it, and went out to meet them.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ פְלִשְׁתִּים, כִּי-נִמְשַׁח דָּוִיד לְמֶלֶךְ עַל-כָּל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, וַיַּעֲלוּ כָל-פְּלִשְׁתִּים, לְבַקֵּשׁ אֶת-דָּוִיד; וַיִּשְׁמַע דָּוִיד, וַיֵּצֵא לִפְנֵיהֶם. | And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David; and David heard of it, and went out to meet them. | וַיֵּצֵא אֲלֵיהֶם זֶרַח הַכּוּשִׁי, בְּחַיִל אֶלֶף אֲלָפִים, וּמַרְכָּבוֹת, שְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת; וַיָּבֹא, עַד-מָרֵשָׁה. | And there came out against them Zerah the Ethiopian with an army of a thousand thousand, and three hundred chariots; and he came unto Mareshah.

text_he: ופלשתים באו ויפשטו בעמק רפאים | Now the Philistines had come and made a raid in the valley of Rephaim | ויצא אסא לפניו ויערכו מלחמה בגיא צפתה למרשה | Then Asa went out to meet him and they set the battle in array in the valley of Zephath at Mareshah
text_en: Now the Philistines had come and made a raid in the valley of Rephaim.
text_pisuk: וּפְלִשְׁתִּים, בָּאוּ; וַיִּפְשְׁטוּ, בְּעֵמֶק רְפָאִים. | Now the Philistines had come and made a raid in the valley of Rephaim. | וַיֵּצֵא אָסָא, לְפָנָיו; וַיַּעַרְכוּ, מִלְחָמָה, בְּגֵיא צְפַתָה, לְמָרֵשָׁה. | Then Asa went out to meet him, and they set the battle in array in the valley of Zephath at Mareshah.

text_he: וישאל דויד באלהים לאמר--האעלה על-פלשתאדונים (פלשתים) ונתם בידי ויאמר לו יהוה עלה ונתים בידך | And David inquired of God saying 'Shall I go up against the Philistines and wilt Thou deliver them into my hand' And the LORD said unto him 'Go up for I will deliver them into thy hand' | ויקרא אסא אל-יהוה אלהיו ויאמר יהוה אין-עמך לעזר בין רב לאין כח עזרנו יהוה אלהינו כי-עליך נשענו ובשמך באנו על-המון הזה יהוה אלהינו אתה אל-יעצר עמך אנוש | And Asa cried unto the LORD his God and said 'LORD there is none beside Thee to help between the mighty and him that hath no strength help us O LORD our God for we rely on Thee and in Thy name are we come against this multitude Thou art the LORD our God let not man prevail against Thee'{S}
text_en: And David inquired of God, saying: 'Shall I go up against the Philistines? and wilt Thou deliver them into my hand?' And the LORD said unto him: 'Go up; for I will deliver them into thy hand.'
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁאַל דָּוִיד בֵּאלֹהִים, לֵאמֹר--הַאֶעֱלֶה עַל-פלשתיים (פְּלִשְׁתִּים), וּנְתַתָּם בְּיָדִי; וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ יְהוָה עֲלֵה, וּנְתַתִּים בְּיָדֶךָ. | And David inquired of God, saying: 'Shall I go up against the Philistines? and wilt Thou deliver them into my hand?' And the LORD said unto him: 'Go up; for I will deliver them into thy hand.' | וַיִּקְרָא אָסָא אֶל-יְהוָה אֱלֹהָיו, וַיֹּאמַר, יְהוָה אֵין-עִמְּךָ לַעְזֹר בֵּין רַב לְאֵין כֹּחַ, עָזְרֵנוּ יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ כִּי-עָלֶיךָ נִשְׁעַנּוּ וּבְשִׁמְךָ בָאנוּ עַל-הֶהָמוֹן הַזֶּה: יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ אַתָּה, אַל-יַעְצֹר עִמְּךָ אֱנוֹשׁ. | And Asa cried unto the LORD his God, and said: 'LORD, there is none beside Thee to help, between the mighty and him that hath no strength; help us, O LORD our God; for we rely on Thee, and in Thy name are we come against this multitude. Thou art the LORD our God; let not man prevail against Thee.'{S}
text_notes: יי represents the divine name (Tetragrammaton) and has been replaced with אדוני (Adonai)

text_he: ויעלו בעל-פרצים ויכם שם דויד ויאמר דויד פרץ האלהים את-אויבי בידי כפרץ מים על-כן קראו שם-המקום הוא--בעל פרצים | So they came up to Baal-perazim and David smote them there and David said 'God hath broken mine enemies by my hand like the breach of waters' Therefore they called the name of that place Baal-perazim | ויגף יהוה את-הכושים לפני אסא ולפני יהודה וינסו הכושים | So the LORD smote the Ethiopians before Asa and before Judah and the Ethiopians fled
text_en: So they came up to Baal-perazim, and David smote them there; and David said: 'God hath broken mine enemies by my hand, like the breach of waters.' Therefore they called the name of that place Baal-perazim.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעֲלוּ בְּבַעַל-פְּרָצִים, וַיַּכֵּם שָׁם דָּוִיד, וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד, פָּרַץ הָאֱלֹהִים אֶת-אוֹיְבַי בְּיָדִי כְּפֶרֶץ מָיִם; עַל-כֵּן, קָרְאוּ שֵׁם-הַמָּקוֹם הַהוּא--בַּעַל פְּרָצִים. | So they came up to Baal-perazim, and David smote them there; and David said: 'God hath broken mine enemies by my hand, like the breach of waters.' Therefore they called the name of that place Baal-perazim. | וַיִּגֹּף יְהוָה אֶת-הַכּוּשִׁים, לִפְנֵי אָסָא וְלִפְנֵי יְהוּדָה; וַיָּנֻסוּ, הַכּוּשִׁים. | So the LORD smote the Ethiopians before Asa, and before Judah; and the Ethiopians fled.

text_he: ויעזבו שם את-אלהיהם ויאמר דויד וישרפו באש | And they left their gods there and David gave commandment and they were burned with fire | וירדפם אסא והעם אשר-עמו עד-לגר ויפל מכושים לאין להם מחיה כי-נשברו לפני-יהוה ולפני מחנהו וישאו של הרבה מאד | And Asa and the people that were with him pursued them unto Gerar and there fell of the Ethiopians so that none remained alive for they were shattered before the LORD and before His host and they carried away very much booty
text_en: And they left their gods there; and David gave commandment, and they were burned with fire.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַזְבוּ שָׁם, אֶת-אֱלֹהֵיהֶם; וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד, וַיִּשָּׂרְפוּ בָּאֵשׁ. | And they left their gods there; and David gave commandment, and they were burned with fire. | וַיִּרְדְּפֵם אָסָא וְהָעָם אֲשֶׁר-עִמּוֹ, עַד-לִגְרָר, וַיִּפֹּל מִכּוּשִׁים לְאֵין לָהֶם מִחְיָה, כִּי-נִשְׁבְּרוּ לִפְנֵי-יְהוָה וְלִפְנֵי מַחֲנֵהוּ; וַיִּשְׂאוּ שָׁלָל, הַרְבֵּה מְאֹד. | And Asa and the people that were with him pursued them unto Gerar; and there fell of the Ethiopians so that none remained alive; for they were shattered before the LORD, and before His host; and they carried away very much booty.

text_he: ויסיפו עוד פלשתים ויפשטו בעמק | And the Philistines yet again made a raid in the valley | ויכו את כל-הערים סביבות גר--כי-היה פחד-יהוה עליהם ויבזו את-כל-הערים כי-בזה רבה היתה בהם | And they smote all the cities round about Gerar for a terror from the LORD came upon them and they spoiled all the cities for there was much spoil in them
text_en: And the Philistines yet again made a raid in the valley.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּסִיפוּ עוֹד פְּלִשְׁתִּים, וַיִּפְשְׁטוּ בָּעֵמֶק. | And the Philistines yet again made a raid in the valley. | וַיַּכּוּ, אֵת כָּל-הֶעָרִים סְבִיבוֹת גְּרָר--כִּי-הָיָה פַחַד-יְהוָה, עֲלֵיהֶם; וַיָּבֹזּוּ, אֶת-כָּל-הֶעָרִים, כִּי-בִזָּה רַבָּה, הָיְתָה בָהֶם. | And they smote all the cities round about Gerar; for a terror from the LORD came upon them; and they spoiled all the cities; for there was much spoil in them.

text_he: וישאל עוד דויד באלהים ויאמר לו האלהים לא תעלה אחריהם הסב מעליהם ובאת להם מול הבכאים | And David inquired again of God and God said unto him 'Thou shalt not go up after them turn away from them and come upon them over against the mulberry-trees | וגם-אהלי מקנה הכו וישבו צאן לרב וגמלים וישבו ירושלם | They smote also the tents of cattle and carried away sheep in abundance and camels and returned to Jerusalem{S}
text_en: And David inquired again of God; and God said unto him: 'Thou shalt not go up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry-trees.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁאַל עוֹד דָּוִיד, בֵּאלֹהִים, וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ הָאֱלֹהִים, לֹא תַעֲלֶה אַחֲרֵיהֶם: הָסֵב, מֵעֲלֵיהֶם, וּבָאתָ לָהֶם, מִמּוּל הַבְּכָאִים. | And David inquired again of God; and God said unto him: 'Thou shalt not go up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry-trees. | וְגַם-אָהֳלֵי מִקְנֶה, הִכּוּ; וַיִּשְׁבּוּ צֹאן לָרֹב וּגְמַלִּים, וַיָּשֻׁבוּ יְרוּשָׁלִָם. | They smote also the tents of cattle, and carried away sheep in abundance and camels, and returned to Jerusalem.{S}

text_he: ויהי כשמעך את-קול הצעדה בראשי הבכאים--אז תצא במלחמה כי-יצא האלהים לפניך להכות את-מחנה פלשתים
text_en: And it shall be, when thou hearest the sound of marching in the tops of the mulberry-trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle; for God is gone out before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.'
text_pisuk: וִיהִי כְּשָׁמְעֲךָ אֶת-קוֹל הַצְּעָדָה, בְּרָאשֵׁי הַבְּכָאִים--אָז, תֵּצֵא בַמִּלְחָמָה: כִּי-יָצָא הָאֱלֹהִים לְפָנֶיךָ, לְהַכּוֹת אֶת-מַחֲנֵה פְלִשְׁתִּים.

text_he: ויעש דויד כאשר צוהו האלהים ויכו את-מחנה פלשתים מגבעון ועד-גזרה
text_en: And David did as God commanded him; and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gezer.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ דָּוִיד, כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּהוּ הָאֱלֹהִים; וַיַּכּוּ אֶת-מַחֲנֵה פְלִשְׁתִּים, מִגִּבְעוֹן וְעַד-גָּזְרָה.

text_he: ויצא שם-דויד בכל-הארצות ויהוה נתן את-פחדו על-כל-הגוים
text_en: And the fame of David went out into all lands; and the LORD brought the fear of him upon all nations.
text_pisuk: וַיֵּצֵא שֵׁם-דָּוִיד, בְּכָל-הָאֲרָצוֹת; וַיהוָה נָתַן אֶת-פַּחְדּוֹ, עַל-כָּל-הַגּוֹיִם.

text_he: ויעש-לו בתים בעיר דויד ויכן מקום לארון האלהים ויט-לו אהל | And made him houses in the city of David and he prepared a place for the ark of God and pitched for it a tent | ועזריהו בן-עוד היתה עליו רוח אלהים | And the spirit of God came upon Azariah the son of Oded
text_en: And made him houses in the city of David; and he prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ-לוֹ בָתִּים, בְּעִיר דָּוִיד; וַיָּכֶן מָקוֹם לַאֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים, וַיֶּט-לוֹ אֹהֶל. | And made him houses in the city of David; and he prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent. | וַעֲזַרְיָהוּ, בֶּן-עוֹדֵד, הָיְתָה עָלָיו, רוּחַ אֱלֹהִים. | And the spirit of God came upon Azariah the son of Oded;

text_he: אז אמר דויד לא לשאת את-ארון האלהים כי אם-הלוים כי-בם בחר יהוה לשאת את-ארון יהוה ולשרתו--עד-עולם | Then David said 'None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites for them hath the LORD chosen to carry the ark of the LORD and to minister unto Him for ever' | ויצא לפני אסא ויאמר לו שמעוני אסא וכל-יהודה ובנימן יהוה עמכם בהיותכם עמו ואם-תדרשהו ימצא לכם ואם-תעזבהו יעזב אתכם | and he went out to meet Asa and said unto him 'Hear ye me Asa and all Judah and Benjamin the LORD is with you while ye are with Him and if ye seek Him He will be found of you but if ye forsake Him He will forsake you{S}
text_en: Then David said: 'None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites; for them hath the LORD chosen to carry the ark of the LORD, and to minister unto Him for ever.'
text_pisuk: אָז, אָמַר דָּוִיד, לֹא לָשֵׂאת אֶת-אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים, כִּי אִם-הַלְוִיִּם: כִּי-בָם בָּחַר יְהוָה, לָשֵׂאת אֶת-אֲרוֹן יְהוָה וּלְשָׁרְתוֹ--עַד-עוֹלָם. | Then David said: 'None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites; for them hath the LORD chosen to carry the ark of the LORD, and to minister unto Him for ever.' | וַיֵּצֵא, לִפְנֵי אָסָא, וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ, שְׁמָעוּנִי אָסָא וְכָל-יְהוּדָה וּבִנְיָמִן: יְהוָה עִמָּכֶם, בִּהְיוֹתְכֶם עִמּוֹ, וְאִם-תִּדְרְשֻׁהוּ יִמָּצֵא לָכֶם, וְאִם-תַּעַזְבֻהוּ יַעֲזֹב אֶתְכֶם. | and he went out to meet Asa, and said unto him: 'Hear ye me, Asa, and all Judah and Benjamin: the LORD is with you, while ye are with Him; and if ye seek Him, He will be found of you; but if ye forsake Him, He will forsake you.{S}

text_he: ויקהל דויד את-כל-ישראל אל-ירושלם להעלות את-ארון יהוה אל-מקומו אשר-הכין לו | And David assembled all Israel at Jerusalem to bring up the ark of the LORD unto its place which he had prepared for it | וימים רבים לישראל לא אלהי אמת ולא כהן מורה--ולא תורה | Now for long seasons Israel was without the true God and without a teaching priest and without law
text_en: And David assembled all Israel at Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the LORD unto its place, which he had prepared for it.
text_pisuk: וַיַּקְהֵל דָּוִיד אֶת-כָּל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, אֶל-יְרוּשָׁלִָם, לְהַעֲלוֹת אֶת-אֲרוֹן יְהוָה, אֶל-מְקוֹמוֹ אֲשֶׁר-הֵכִין לוֹ. | And David assembled all Israel at Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the LORD unto its place, which he had prepared for it. | וְיָמִים רַבִּים, לְיִשְׂרָאֵל: לְלֹא אֱלֹהֵי אֱמֶת, וּלְלֹא כֹּהֵן מוֹרֶה--וּלְלֹא תוֹרָה. | Now for long seasons Israel was without the true God, and without a teaching priest, and without law;

text_he: ויאסף דויד את-בני אהרן ואת-הלוים | And David gathered together the sons of Aaron and the Levites{S} | וישב בצר-לו על-יהוה אלהי ישראל ויבקשהו וימצא להם | but when in their distress they turned unto the LORD the God of Israel and sought Him He was found of them
text_en: And David gathered together the sons of Aaron, and the Levites;{S}
text_pisuk: וַיֶּאֱסֹף דָּוִיד אֶת-בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן, וְאֶת-הַלְוִיִּם. | And David gathered together the sons of Aaron, and the Levites;{S} | וַיָּשָׁב, בַּצַּר-לוֹ, עַל-יְהוָה, אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיְבַקְשֻׁהוּ, וַיִּמָּצֵא לָהֶם. | but when in their distress they turned unto the LORD, the God of Israel, and sought Him, He was found of them.

text_he: לבני קהת--אוריאל השר ואחיו מאה ועשרים | of the sons of Kohath Uriel the chief and his brethren a hundred and twenty{S} | ובעתים הם אין שלום ליוצא ולבא כי מהומת רבות על כל-ישבי הארצות | And in those times there was no peace to him that went out nor to him that came in but great discomfitures were upon all the inhabitants of the lands
text_en: of the sons of Kohath: Uriel the chief, and his brethren a hundred and twenty;{S}
text_pisuk: לִבְנֵי, קְהָת--אוּרִיאֵל הַשָּׂר, וְאֶחָיו מֵאָה וְעֶשְׂרִים. | of the sons of Kohath: Uriel the chief, and his brethren a hundred and twenty;{S} | וּבָעִתִּים הָהֵם, אֵין שָׁלוֹם לַיּוֹצֵא וְלַבָּא: כִּי מְהוּמֹת רַבּוֹת, עַל כָּל-יֹשְׁבֵי הָאֲרָצוֹת. | And in those times there was no peace to him that went out, nor to him that came in, but great discomfitures were upon all the inhabitants of the lands.

text_he: לבני מרי--עשיה השר ואחיו מאתים ועשרים | of the sons of Merari Asaiah the chief and his brethren two hundred and twenty{S} | וכתו גוי-בגוי ועיר בעיר כי-אלהים המם בכל-צרה | And they were broken in pieces nation against nation and city against city for God did discomfit them with all manner of adversity
text_en: of the sons of Merari: Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty;{S}
text_pisuk: לִבְנֵי, מְרָרִי--עֲשָׂיָה הַשָּׂר, וְאֶחָיו מָאתַיִם וְעֶשְׂרִים. | of the sons of Merari: Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty;{S} | וְכֻתְּתוּ גוֹי-בְּגוֹי, וְעִיר בְּעִיר: כִּי-אֱלֹהִים הֲמָמָם, בְּכָל-צָרָה. | And they were broken in pieces, nation against nation, and city against city; for God did discomfit them with all manner of adversity.

text_he: לבני גרשום--יואל השר ואחיו מאה ושלשים | of the sons of Gershom Joel the chief and his brethren a hundred and thirty{S} | ואתם חזקו ואל-ירפו ידיכם כי יש שכר לפעלתכם | But be ye strong and let not your hands be slack for your work shall be rewarded'{S}
text_en: of the sons of Gershom: Joel the chief, and his brethren a hundred and thirty;{S}
text_pisuk: לִבְנֵי, גֵּרְשׁוֹם--יוֹאֵל הַשָּׂר, וְאֶחָיו מֵאָה וּשְׁלֹשִׁים. | of the sons of Gershom: Joel the chief, and his brethren a hundred and thirty;{S} | וְאַתֶּם חִזְקוּ, וְאַל-יִרְפּוּ יְדֵיכֶם: כִּי יֵשׁ שָׂכָר, לִפְעֻלַּתְכֶם. | But be ye strong, and let not your hands be slack; for your work shall be rewarded.'{S}

text_he: לבני אליצפן--שמעיה השר ואחיו מאתים | of the sons of Elizaphan Shemaiah the chief and his brethren two hundred{S} | וכשמע אסא הדברים האלה והנבואה עד הנביא התחזק ויעבר השקוצים מכל-ארץ יהודה ובנימן ומן-הערים אשר לכד מהר אפרים ויחדש את-מזבח יהוה אשר לפני אולם יהוה | And when Asa heard these words even the prophecy of Oded the prophet he took courage and put away the detestable things out of all the land of Judah and Benjamin and out of the cities which he had taken from the hill-country of Ephraim and he renewed the altar of the LORD that was before the porch of the LORD
text_en: of the sons of Elizaphan: Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred;{S}
text_pisuk: לִבְנֵי, אֱלִיצָפָן--שְׁמַעְיָה הַשָּׂר, וְאֶחָיו מָאתָיִם. | of the sons of Elizaphan: Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred;{S} | וְכִשְׁמֹעַ אָסָא הַדְּבָרִים הָאֵלֶּה, וְהַנְּבוּאָה עֹדֵד הַנָּבִיא, הִתְחַזַּק וַיַּעֲבֵר הַשִּׁקּוּצִים מִכָּל-אֶרֶץ יְהוּדָה וּבִנְיָמִן, וּמִן-הֶעָרִים אֲשֶׁר לָכַד מֵהַר אֶפְרָיִם; וַיְחַדֵּשׁ, אֶת-מִזְבַּח יְהוָה, אֲשֶׁר, לִפְנֵי אוּלָם יְהוָה. | And when Asa heard these words, even the prophecy of Oded the prophet, he took courage, and put away the detestable things out of all the land of Judah and Benjamin, and out of the cities which he had taken from the hill-country of Ephraim; and he renewed the altar of the LORD, that was before the porch of the LORD.

text_he: לבני חברון--אליאל השר ואחיו שמונים | of the sons of Hebron Eliel the chief and his brethren fourscore{S} | ויקבץ את-כל-יהודה ובנימן והגרים עמהם מאפרים ומנשה ומשמעון כי-נפלו עליו מישראל לרב בראתם כי-יהוה אלהיו עמו | And he gathered all Judah and Benjamin and them that sojourned with them out of Ephraim and Manasseh and out of Simeon for they fell to him out of Israel in abundance when they saw that the LORD his God was with him
text_en: of the sons of Hebron: Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore;{S}
text_pisuk: לִבְנֵי, חֶבְרוֹן--אֱלִיאֵל הַשָּׂר, וְאֶחָיו שְׁמוֹנִים. | of the sons of Hebron: Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore;{S} | וַיִּקְבֹּץ, אֶת-כָּל-יְהוּדָה וּבִנְיָמִן, וְהַגָּרִים עִמָּהֶם, מֵאֶפְרַיִם וּמְנַשֶּׁה וּמִשִּׁמְעוֹן: כִּי-נָפְלוּ עָלָיו מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל, לָרֹב, בִּרְאֹתָם, כִּי-יְהוָה אֱלֹהָיו עִמּוֹ. | And he gathered all Judah and Benjamin, and them that sojourned with them out of Ephraim and Manasseh, and out of Simeon; for they fell to him out of Israel in abundance, when they saw that the LORD his God was with him.

text_he: לבני עזיאל עמינדב השר--ואחיו מאה ושנים עשר | of the sons of Uzziel Amminadab the chief and his brethren a hundred and twelve | ויקבצו ירושלם בחדש השלשי לשנת חמש-עשרה למלכות אסא | So they gathered themselves together at Jerusalem in the third month in the fifteenth year of the reign of Asa
text_en: of the sons of Uzziel: Amminadab the chief, and his brethren a hundred and twelve.
text_pisuk: לִבְנֵי, עֻזִּיאֵל: עַמִּינָדָב הַשָּׂר--וְאֶחָיו, מֵאָה וּשְׁנֵים עָשָׂר. | of the sons of Uzziel: Amminadab the chief, and his brethren a hundred and twelve. | וַיִּקָּבְצוּ יְרוּשָׁלִַם, בַּחֹדֶשׁ הַשְּׁלִשִׁי, לִשְׁנַת חֲמֵשׁ-עֶשְׂרֵה, לְמַלְכוּת אָסָא. | So they gathered themselves together at Jerusalem in the third month, in the fifteenth year of the reign of Asa.

text_he: ויקרא דויד לצדוק ולאביתר הכהנים ולוים לאוריאל עשיה ויואל שמעיה ואליאל ועמינדב | And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests and for the Levites for Uriel Asaiah and Joel Shemaiah and Eliel and Amminadab{S} | ויזבחו ליהוה ביום הוא מן-השל הביאו בקר שבע מאות וצאן שבעת אלפים | And they sacrificed unto the LORD in that day of the spoil which they had brought seven hundred oxen and seven thousand sheep
text_en: And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּקְרָא דָוִיד, לְצָדוֹק וּלְאֶבְיָתָר הַכֹּהֲנִים; וְלַלְוִיִּם, לְאוּרִיאֵל עֲשָׂיָה וְיוֹאֵל שְׁמַעְיָה, וֶאֱלִיאֵל, וְעַמִּינָדָב. | And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,{S} | וַיִּזְבְּחוּ לַיהוָה בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא, מִן-הַשָּׁלָל הֵבִיאוּ: בָּקָר שְׁבַע מֵאוֹת, וְצֹאן שִׁבְעַת אֲלָפִים. | And they sacrificed unto the LORD in that day, of the spoil which they had brought, seven hundred oxen and seven thousand sheep.

text_he: ויאמר להם אתם ראשי האבות לוים התקדשו אתם ואחיכם והעליתם את ארון יהוה אלהי ישראל אל-הכינותי לו | and said unto them 'Ye are the heads of the fathers' houses of the Levites sanctify yourselves both ye and your brethren that ye may bring up the ark of the LORD the God of Israel unto the place that I have prepared for it | ויבאו ברית--לדרוש את-יהוה אלהי אבותיהם בכל-לבם ובכל-נפשם | And they entered into the covenant to seek the LORD the God of their fathers with all their heart and with all their soul
text_en: and said unto them: 'Ye are the heads of the fathers' houses of the Levites; sanctify yourselves, both ye and your brethren, that ye may bring up the ark of the LORD, the God of Israel, unto the place that I have prepared for it.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר לָהֶם, אַתֶּם רָאשֵׁי הָאָבוֹת לַלְוִיִּם; הִתְקַדְּשׁוּ, אַתֶּם וַאֲחֵיכֶם, וְהַעֲלִיתֶם אֵת אֲרוֹן יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, אֶל-הֲכִינוֹתִי לוֹ. | and said unto them: 'Ye are the heads of the fathers' houses of the Levites; sanctify yourselves, both ye and your brethren, that ye may bring up the ark of the LORD, the God of Israel, unto the place that I have prepared for it. | וַיָּבֹאוּ בַבְּרִית--לִדְרוֹשׁ, אֶת-יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי אֲבוֹתֵיהֶם: בְּכָל-לְבָבָם, וּבְכָל-נַפְשָׁם. | And they entered into the covenant to seek the LORD, the God of their fathers, with all their heart and with all their soul;

text_he: כי למבראשונה לא אתם--פרץ יהוה אלהינו בנו כי-לא דרשנהו כמשפט | For because ye not at the first the LORD our God made a breach upon us for that we sought Him not according to the ordinance' | וכל אשר לא-ידרש ליהוה אלהי-ישראל יומת--למן-קטן ועד-גדול למאיש ועד-אשה | and that whosoever would not seek the LORD the God of Israel should be put to death whether small or great whether man or woman
text_en: For because ye not at the first, the LORD our God made a breach upon us, for that we sought Him not according to the ordinance.'
text_pisuk: כִּי לְמַבָּרִאשׁוֹנָה, לֹא אַתֶּם--פָּרַץ יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ בָּנוּ, כִּי-לֹא דְרַשְׁנֻהוּ כַּמִּשְׁפָּט. | For because ye not at the first, the LORD our God made a breach upon us, for that we sought Him not according to the ordinance.' | וְכֹל אֲשֶׁר לֹא-יִדְרֹשׁ לַיהוָה אֱלֹהֵי-יִשְׂרָאֵל, יוּמָת--לְמִן-קָטֹן, וְעַד-גָּדוֹל, לְמֵאִישׁ, וְעַד-אִשָּׁה. | and that whosoever would not seek the LORD, the God of Israel, should be put to death, whether small or great, whether man or woman.

text_he: ויתקדשו הכהנים והלוים להעלות את-ארון יהוה אלהי ישראל | So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the LORD the God of Israel | וישבעו ליהוה בקול גדול ובתרועה--ובחצרות ובשופרות | And they swore unto the LORD with a loud voice and with shouting and with trumpets and with horns
text_en: So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the LORD, the God of Israel.
text_pisuk: וַיִּתְקַדְּשׁוּ, הַכֹּהֲנִים וְהַלְוִיִּם, לְהַעֲלוֹת, אֶת-אֲרוֹן יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל. | So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the LORD, the God of Israel. | וַיִּשָּׁבְעוּ, לַיהוָה, בְּקוֹל גָּדוֹל, וּבִתְרוּעָה--וּבַחֲצֹצְרוֹת, וּבְשׁוֹפָרוֹת. | And they swore unto the LORD with a loud voice, and with shouting, and with trumpets, and with horns.

text_he: וישאו בני-הלוים את ארון האלהים כאשר צוה משה כדבר יהוה--בכתפם במטות עליהם | And the children of the Levites bore the ark of God upon their shoulders with the bars thereon as Moses commanded according to the word of the LORD | וישמחו כל-יהודה על-השבועה כי בכל-לבם נשבעו ובכל-רצונם בקשהו וימצא להם וינח יהוה להם מסביב | And all Judah rejoiced at the oath for they had sworn with all their heart and sought Him with their whole desire and He was found of them and the LORD gave them rest round about
text_en: And the children of the Levites bore the ark of God upon their shoulders with the bars thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of the LORD.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׂאוּ בְנֵי-הַלְוִיִּם, אֵת אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים, כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה מֹשֶׁה, כִּדְבַר יְהוָה--בִּכְתֵפָם בַּמֹּטוֹת, עֲלֵיהֶם. | And the children of the Levites bore the ark of God upon their shoulders with the bars thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of the LORD. | וַיִּשְׂמְחוּ כָל-יְהוּדָה עַל-הַשְּׁבוּעָה, כִּי בְכָל-לְבָבָם נִשְׁבָּעוּ, וּבְכָל-רְצוֹנָם בִּקְשֻׁהוּ, וַיִּמָּצֵא לָהֶם; וַיָּנַח יְהוָה לָהֶם, מִסָּבִיב. | And all Judah rejoiced at the oath; for they had sworn with all their heart, and sought Him with their whole desire; and He was found of them; and the LORD gave them rest round about.

text_he: ויאמר דויד לשרי הלוים להעמיד את-אחיהם המשרים בכלי-שיר נבלים וכנרות ומצלתים--משמיעים להרים-בקול לשמחה | And David spoke to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren the singers with instruments of music psalteries and harps and cymbals sounding aloud and lifting up the voice with joy | וגם-מעכה אם אסא המלך הסירה מגבירה אשר-עשתה לאשרה מפלצת ויכרת אסא את-מפלצתה וידק וישרף בנחל קדרון | And also Maacah the mother of Asa the king he removed her from being queen because she had made an abominable image for an Asherah and Asa cut down her image and made dust of it and burnt it at the brook Kidron
text_en: And David spoke to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren the singers, with instruments of music, psalteries and harps and cymbals, sounding aloud and lifting up the voice with joy.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד, לְשָׂרֵי הַלְוִיִּם, לְהַעֲמִיד אֶת-אֲחֵיהֶם הַמְשֹׁרְרִים, בִּכְלֵי-שִׁיר נְבָלִים וְכִנֹּרוֹת וּמְצִלְתָּיִם--מַשְׁמִיעִים לְהָרִים-בְּקוֹל, לְשִׂמְחָה. | And David spoke to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren the singers, with instruments of music, psalteries and harps and cymbals, sounding aloud and lifting up the voice with joy. | וְגַם-מַעֲכָה אֵם אָסָא הַמֶּלֶךְ, הֱסִירָהּ מִגְּבִירָה, אֲשֶׁר-עָשְׂתָה לַאֲשֵׁרָה, מִפְלָצֶת; וַיִּכְרֹת אָסָא, אֶת-מִפְלַצְתָּהּ, וַיָּדֶק, וַיִּשְׂרֹף בְּנַחַל קִדְרוֹן. | And also Maacah the mother of Asa the king, he removed her from being queen, because she had made an abominable image for an Asherah; and Asa cut down her image, and made dust of it, and burnt it at the brook Kidron.

text_he: ויעמידו הלוים את הימן בן-יואל ומן-אחיו אסף בן-ברכיהו ומן-בני מרי אחיהם איתן בן-קושיהו | So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel and of his brethren Asaph the son of Berechiah{S}and of the sons of Merari their brethren Ethan the son of Kushaiah | והבמות--לא-סרו מישראל רק לב-אסא היה שלם כל-ימיו | But the high places were not taken away out of Israel nevertheless the heart of Asa was whole all his days
text_en: So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah;{S}and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;
text_pisuk: וַיַּעֲמִידוּ הַלְוִיִּם, אֵת הֵימָן בֶּן-יוֹאֵל, וּמִן-אֶחָיו, אָסָף בֶּן-בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ;  וּמִן-בְּנֵי מְרָרִי אֲחֵיהֶם, אֵיתָן בֶּן-קוּשָׁיָהוּ. | So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah;{S}and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah; | וְהַבָּמוֹת--לֹא-סָרוּ, מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל: רַק לְבַב-אָסָא הָיָה שָׁלֵם, כָּל-יָמָיו. | But the high places were not taken away out of Israel; nevertheless the heart of Asa was whole all his days.

text_he: ועמהם אחיהם המשנים זכריהו בן ויעזיאל ושמירמות ויחיאל ועני אליאב ובניהו ומעשיהו ומתיהו ואליפלהו ומקניהו ועבד אדם ויעיאל--השערים | and with them their brethren of the second degree Zechariah Ben and Jaaziel and Shemiramoth and Jehiel and Unni Eliab and Benaiah and Maaseiah and Mattithiah and Eliphalehu and Mikneiah and Obed-edom and Jeiel the doorkeepers | ויבא את-קדשי אביו וקדשיו--בית האלהים כסף וזהב וכלים | And he brought into the house of God the things that his father had hallowed and that he himself had hallowed silver and gold and vessels
text_en: and with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Eliphalehu, and Mikneiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, the doorkeepers.
text_pisuk: וְעִמָּהֶם, אֲחֵיהֶם הַמִּשְׁנִים: זְכַרְיָהוּ בֵּן וְיַעֲזִיאֵל וּשְׁמִירָמוֹת וִיחִיאֵל וְעֻנִּי אֱלִיאָב וּבְנָיָהוּ וּמַעֲשֵׂיָהוּ וּמַתִּתְיָהוּ וֶאֱלִיפְלֵהוּ וּמִקְנֵיָהוּ וְעֹבֵד אֱדֹם, וִיעִיאֵל--הַשֹּׁעֲרִים. | and with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Eliphalehu, and Mikneiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, the doorkeepers. | וַיָּבֵא אֶת-קָדְשֵׁי אָבִיו, וְקָדָשָׁיו--בֵּית הָאֱלֹהִים: כֶּסֶף וְזָהָב, וְכֵלִים. | And he brought into the house of God the things that his father had hallowed, and that he himself had hallowed, silver, and gold, and vessels.

text_he: והמשרים הימן אסף ואיתן--במצלתים נחשת להשמיע | So the singers Heman Asaph and Ethan with cymbals of brass to sound aloud | ומלחמה לא היתה עד שנת-שלשים וחמש למלכות אסא | And there was no more war unto the five and thirtieth year of the reign of Asa
text_en: So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, with cymbals of brass to sound aloud;
text_pisuk: וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִים, הֵימָן אָסָף וְאֵיתָן--בִּמְצִלְתַּיִם נְחֹשֶׁת, לְהַשְׁמִיעַ. | So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, with cymbals of brass to sound aloud; | וּמִלְחָמָה, לֹא הָיָתָה, עַד שְׁנַת-שְׁלֹשִׁים וְחָמֵשׁ, לְמַלְכוּת אָסָא. | And there was no more war unto the five and thirtieth year of the reign of Asa.

text_he: וזכריה ועזיאל ושמירמות ויחיאל ועני ואליאב ומעשיהו ובניהו--בנבלים על-עלמות
text_en: and Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries set to Alamoth;
text_pisuk: וּזְכַרְיָה וַעֲזִיאֵל וּשְׁמִירָמוֹת וִיחִיאֵל, וְעֻנִּי וֶאֱלִיאָב, וּמַעֲשֵׂיָהוּ, וּבְנָיָהוּ--בִּנְבָלִים, עַל-עֲלָמוֹת.

text_he: ומתיהו ואליפלהו ומקניהו ועבד אדם ויעיאל ועזיהו--בכנרות על-השמינית לנצח
text_en: and Mattithiah, and Eliphalehu, and Mikneiahu, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps on the Sheminith, to lead.
text_pisuk: וּמַתִּתְיָהוּ וֶאֱלִיפְלֵהוּ, וּמִקְנֵיָהוּ וְעֹבֵד אֱדֹם, וִיעִיאֵל, וַעֲזַזְיָהוּ--בְּכִנֹּרוֹת עַל-הַשְּׁמִינִית, לְנַצֵּחַ.

text_he: וכניהו שר-הלוים במשא--יסר במשא כי מבין הוא
text_en: And Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, was over the song; he was master in the song, because he was skilful.
text_pisuk: וּכְנַנְיָהוּ שַׂר-הַלְוִיִּם, בְּמַשָּׂא--יָסֹר, בַּמַּשָּׂא, כִּי מֵבִין, הוּא.

text_he: וברכיה ואלקנה שערים לארון
text_en: And Berechiah and Elkanah were door-keepers for the ark.
text_pisuk: וּבֶרֶכְיָה, וְאֶלְקָנָה, שֹׁעֲרִים, לָאָרוֹן.

text_he: ושבניהו ויושפט ונתנאל ועמשי וזכריהו ובניהו ואליעזר הכהנים מחצרים (מחצרים) בחצרות לפני ארון האלהים ועבד אדם ויחיה שערים לארון
text_en: And Shebaniah, and Joshaphat, and Nethanel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, did blow with the trumpets before the ark of God; and Obed-edom and Jehiah were doorkeepers for the ark.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁבַנְיָהוּ וְיוֹשָׁפָט וּנְתַנְאֵל וַעֲמָשַׂי וּזְכַרְיָהוּ וּבְנָיָהוּ וֶאֱלִיעֶזֶר, הַכֹּהֲנִים, מחצצרים (מַחְצְרִים) בַּחֲצֹצְרוֹת, לִפְנֵי אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים; וְעֹבֵד אֱדֹם וִיחִיָּה, שֹׁעֲרִים לָאָרוֹן.

text_he: ויהי דויד וזקני ישראל ושרי האלפים הלכים להעלות את-ארון ברית-יהוה מן-בית עבד-אדם--בשמחה
text_en: So David, and the elders of Israel, and the captains over thousands, went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the LORD out of the house of Obed-edom with joy.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי דָוִיד וְזִקְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְשָׂרֵי הָאֲלָפִים: הַהֹלְכִים, לְהַעֲלוֹת אֶת-אֲרוֹן בְּרִית-יְהוָה מִן-בֵּית עֹבֵד-אֱדֹם--בְּשִׂמְחָה.

text_he: ויהי בעזר האלהים את-הלוים נשאי ארון ברית-יהוה ויזבחו שבעה-פרים ושבעה אילים
text_en: And it came to pass, when God helped the Levites that bore the ark of the covenant of the LORD, that they sacrificed seven bullocks and seven rams.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי, בֶּעְזֹר הָאֱלֹהִים, אֶת-הַלְוִיִּם, נֹשְׂאֵי אֲרוֹן בְּרִית-יְהוָה; וַיִּזְבְּחוּ שִׁבְעָה-פָרִים, וְשִׁבְעָה אֵילִים.

text_he: ודויד מכרבל במעיל בוץ וכל-הלוים הנשאים את-הארון והמשרים וכניה השר המשא המשרים ועל-דויד אפוד בד
text_en: And David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites that bore the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah the master of the singers in the song; and David had upon him an ephod of linen.
text_pisuk: וְדָוִיד מְכֻרְבָּל בִּמְעִיל בּוּץ, וְכָל-הַלְוִיִּם הַנֹּשְׂאִים אֶת-הָאָרוֹן, וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִים, וּכְנַנְיָה הַשַּׂר הַמַּשָּׂא הַמְשֹׁרְרִים; וְעַל-דָּוִיד, אֵפוֹד בָּד.

text_he: וכל-ישראל מעלים את-ארון ברית-יהוה בתרועה ובקול שופר ובחצרות ובמצלתים משמעים בנבלים וכנרות
text_en: Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the LORD with shouting, and with sound of the horn, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, sounding aloud with psalteries and harps.
text_pisuk: וְכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, מַעֲלִים אֶת-אֲרוֹן בְּרִית-יְהוָה, בִּתְרוּעָה וּבְקוֹל שׁוֹפָר, וּבַחֲצֹצְרוֹת וּבִמְצִלְתָּיִם; מַשְׁמִעִים, בִּנְבָלִים וְכִנֹּרוֹת.

text_he: ויהי ארון ברית יהוה בא עד-עיר דויד ומיכל בת-שאול נשקפה בעד החלון ותרא את-המלך דויד מרקד ומשחק ותבז לו בלבה
text_en: And it came to pass, as the ark of the covenant of the LORD came to the city of David, that Michal the daughter of Saul looked out at the window, and saw king David dancing and making merry; and she despised him in her heart.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי, אֲרוֹן בְּרִית יְהוָה, בָּא, עַד-עִיר דָּוִיד; וּמִיכַל בַּת-שָׁאוּל נִשְׁקְפָה בְּעַד הַחַלּוֹן, וַתֵּרֶא אֶת-הַמֶּלֶךְ דָּוִיד מְרַקֵּד וּמְשַׂחֵק, וַתִּבֶז לוֹ, בְּלִבָּהּ.

text_he: ויביאו את-ארון האלהים ויציגו אתו בתוך האהל אשר נטה-לו דויד ויקריבו עלות ושלמים לפני האלהים | And they brought in the ark of God and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it and they offered burnt-offerings and peace-offerings before God | בשנת שלשים וש למלכות אסא עלה בעשא מלך-ישראל על-יהודה ויבן את-הרמה--לבלתי ת יוצא ובא לאסא מלך יהודה | In the six and thirtieth year of the reign of Asa Baasa king of Israel went up against Judah and built Ramah that he might not suffer any to go out or come in to Asa king of Judah
text_en: And they brought in the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it, and they offered burnt-offerings and peace-offerings before God.
text_pisuk: וַיָּבִיאוּ, אֶת-אֲרוֹן הָאֱלֹהִים, וַיַּצִּיגוּ אֹתוֹ, בְּתוֹךְ הָאֹהֶל אֲשֶׁר נָטָה-לוֹ דָּוִיד; וַיַּקְרִיבוּ עֹלוֹת וּשְׁלָמִים, לִפְנֵי הָאֱלֹהִים. | And they brought in the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it, and they offered burnt-offerings and peace-offerings before God. | בִּשְׁנַת שְׁלֹשִׁים וָשֵׁשׁ, לְמַלְכוּת אָסָא, עָלָה בַּעְשָׁא מֶלֶךְ-יִשְׂרָאֵל עַל-יְהוּדָה, וַיִּבֶן אֶת-הָרָמָה--לְבִלְתִּי, תֵּת יוֹצֵא וָבָא, לְאָסָא, מֶלֶךְ יְהוּדָה. | In the six and thirtieth year of the reign of Asa, Baasa king of Israel went up against Judah, and built Ramah, that he might not suffer any to go out or come in to Asa king of Judah.

text_he: ויכל דויד מהעלות העלה והשלמים ויברך את-העם בשם יהוה | And when David had made an end of offering the burnt-offering and the peace-offerings he blessed the people in the name of the LORD | ויצא אסא כסף וזהב מאצרות בית יהוה--ובית המלך וישלח אל-בן-הד מלך ארם היושב בדרמשק לאמר | Then Asa brought out silver and gold out of the treasures of the house of the LORD and of the king's house and sent to Ben-hadad king of Aram that dwelt at Damascus saying
text_en: And when David had made an end of offering the burnt-offering and the peace-offerings, he blessed the people in the name of the LORD.
text_pisuk: וַיְכַל דָּוִיד, מֵהַעֲלוֹת הָעֹלָה וְהַשְּׁלָמִים; וַיְבָרֶךְ אֶת-הָעָם, בְּשֵׁם יְהוָה. | And when David had made an end of offering the burnt-offering and the peace-offerings, he blessed the people in the name of the LORD. | וַיֹּצֵא אָסָא כֶּסֶף וְזָהָב, מֵאֹצְרוֹת בֵּית יְהוָה--וּבֵית הַמֶּלֶךְ; וַיִּשְׁלַח, אֶל-בֶּן-הֲדַד מֶלֶךְ אֲרָם, הַיּוֹשֵׁב בְּדַרְמֶשֶׂק, לֵאמֹר. | Then Asa brought out silver and gold out of the treasures of the house of the LORD and of the king's house, and sent to Ben-hadad king of Aram, that dwelt at Damascus, saying:

text_he: ויחלק לכל-איש ישראל מאיש ועד-אשה--לאיש כר-לחם ואשפר ואשישה | And he dealt to every one of Israel both man and woman to every one a loaf of bread and a cake made in a pan and a sweet cake | ברית ביני ובינך ובין אבי ובין אביך הנה שלחתי לך כסף וזהב--לך הפר בריתך את-בעשא מלך ישראל ויעלה מעלי | 'There is a league between me and thee as there was between my father and thy father behold I have sent thee silver and gold go break thy league with Baasa king of Israel that he may depart from me'
text_en: And he dealt to every one of Israel, both man and woman, to every one a loaf of bread, and a cake made in a pan, and a sweet cake.
text_pisuk: וַיְחַלֵּק לְכָל-אִישׁ יִשְׂרָאֵל, מֵאִישׁ וְעַד-אִשָּׁה--לְאִישׁ, כִּכַּר-לֶחֶם, וְאֶשְׁפָּר, וַאֲשִׁישָׁה. | And he dealt to every one of Israel, both man and woman, to every one a loaf of bread, and a cake made in a pan, and a sweet cake. | בְּרִית בֵּינִי וּבֵינֶךָ, וּבֵין אָבִי וּבֵין אָבִיךָ: הִנֵּה שָׁלַחְתִּי לְךָ, כֶּסֶף וְזָהָב--לֵךְ הָפֵר בְּרִיתְךָ אֶת-בַּעְשָׁא מֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְיַעֲלֶה מֵעָלָי. | 'There is a league between me and thee, as there was between my father and thy father; behold, I have sent thee silver and gold; go, break thy league with Baasa king of Israel, that he may depart from me.'

text_he: ויתן לפני ארון יהוה מן-הלוים--משרתים ולהזכיר ולהודות ולהל ליהוה אלהי ישראל | And he appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of the LORD and to celebrate and to thank and praise the LORD the God of Israel{S} | וישמע בן-הד אל-המלך אסא וישלח את-שרי החילים אשר-לו אל-ערי ישראל ויכו את-עיון ואת-דן ואת אבל מים ואת כל-מסכנות ערי נפתלי | And Ben-hadad hearkened unto king Asa and sent the captains of his armies against the cities of Israel and they smote Ijon and Dan and Abelmaim and all the store-cities of Naphtali
text_en: And he appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of the LORD, and to celebrate and to thank and praise the LORD, the God of Israel:{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּתֵּן לִפְנֵי אֲרוֹן יְהוָה, מִן-הַלְוִיִּם--מְשָׁרְתִים; וּלְהַזְכִּיר וּלְהוֹדוֹת וּלְהַלֵּל, לַיהוָה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And he appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of the LORD, and to celebrate and to thank and praise the LORD, the God of Israel:{S} | וַיִּשְׁמַע בֶּן-הֲדַד אֶל-הַמֶּלֶךְ אָסָא, וַיִּשְׁלַח אֶת-שָׂרֵי הַחֲיָלִים אֲשֶׁר-לוֹ אֶל-עָרֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וַיַּכּוּ אֶת-עִיּוֹן וְאֶת-דָּן, וְאֵת אָבֵל מָיִם; וְאֵת כָּל-מִסְכְּנוֹת, עָרֵי נַפְתָּלִי. | And Ben-hadad hearkened unto king Asa, and sent the captains of his armies against the cities of Israel; and they smote Ijon, and Dan, and Abelmaim, and all the store-cities of Naphtali.

text_he: אסף הראש ומשנהו זכריה יעיאל ושמירמות ויחיאל ומתיה ואליאב ובניהו ועבד אדם ויעיאל בכלי נבלים ובכנרות ואסף במצלתים משמיע | Asaph the chief and second to him Zechariah Jeiel and Shemiramoth and Jehiel and Mattithiah and Eliab and Benaiah and Obed-edom and Jeiel with psalteries and with harps and Asaph with cymbals sounding aloud | ויהי כשמע בעשא ויחדל מבנות את-הרמה וישבת את-מלאכתו | And it came to pass when Baasa heard thereof that he left off building Ramah and let his work cease{S}
text_en: Asaph the chief, and second to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, with psalteries and with harps; and Asaph with cymbals, sounding aloud;
text_pisuk: אָסָף הָרֹאשׁ, וּמִשְׁנֵהוּ זְכַרְיָה; יְעִיאֵל וּשְׁמִירָמוֹת וִיחִיאֵל וּמַתִּתְיָה וֶאֱלִיאָב וּבְנָיָהוּ וְעֹבֵד אֱדֹם וִיעִיאֵל, בִּכְלֵי נְבָלִים וּבְכִנֹּרוֹת, וְאָסָף, בַּמְצִלְתַּיִם מַשְׁמִיעַ. | Asaph the chief, and second to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, with psalteries and with harps; and Asaph with cymbals, sounding aloud; | וַיְהִי, כִּשְׁמֹעַ בַּעְשָׁא, וַיֶּחְדַּל, מִבְּנוֹת אֶת-הָרָמָה; וַיַּשְׁבֵּת, אֶת-מְלַאכְתּוֹ. | And it came to pass, when Baasa heard thereof, that he left off building Ramah, and let his work cease.{S}
