text_pisuk: וַיָּנָס אֲרָם, מִלִּפְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וַיַּהֲרֹג דָּוִיד מֵאֲרָם שִׁבְעַת אֲלָפִים רֶכֶב, וְאַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף אִישׁ רַגְלִי; וְאֵת שׁוֹפַךְ שַׂר-הַצָּבָא, הֵמִית.

text_he: ויראו עבדי הדעזר כי נגפו לפני ישראל וישלימו עם-דויד ויעבדהו ולא-אבה ארם להושיע את-בני-עמון עוד
text_en: And when the servants of Hadarezer saw that they were put to the worse before Israel, they made peace with David, and served him; neither would the Arameans help the children of Ammon any more.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּרְאוּ עַבְדֵי הֲדַדְעֶזֶר, כִּי נִגְּפוּ לִפְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וַיַּשְׁלִימוּ עִם-דָּוִיד, וַיַּעַבְדֻהוּ; וְלֹא-אָבָה אֲרָם, לְהוֹשִׁיעַ אֶת-בְּנֵי-עַמּוֹן עוֹד.

text_he: ויהי לעת תשובת השנה לעת צאת המלכים וינהג יואב את-חיל הצבא וישחת את-ארץ בני-עמון ויבא ויצר את-רבה ודויד ישב בירושלם ויך יואב את-רבה ויהרסה | And it came to pass at the time of the return of the year at the time when kings go out to battle that Joab led forth the power of the army and wasted the country of the children of Ammon and came and besieged Rabbah But David tarried at Jerusalem And Joab smote Rabbah and overthrew it | ויהי אחרי-כן באו בני-מואב ובני עמון ועמהם מהעמונים על-יהושפט--למלחמה | And it came to pass after this that the children of Moab and the children of Ammon and with them some of the Ammonites came against Jehoshaphat to battle
text_en: And it came to pass, at the time of the return of the year, at the time when kings go out to battle, that Joab led forth the power of the army, and wasted the country of the children of Ammon, and came and besieged Rabbah. But David tarried at Jerusalem. And Joab smote Rabbah, and overthrew it.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי לְעֵת תְּשׁוּבַת הַשָּׁנָה לְעֵת צֵאת הַמְּלָכִים, וַיִּנְהַג יוֹאָב אֶת-חֵיל הַצָּבָא וַיַּשְׁחֵת אֶת-אֶרֶץ בְּנֵי-עַמּוֹן וַיָּבֹא וַיָּצַר אֶת-רַבָּה, וְדָוִיד, יֹשֵׁב בִּירוּשָׁלִָם; וַיַּךְ יוֹאָב אֶת-רַבָּה, וַיֶּהֶרְסֶהָ. | And it came to pass, at the time of the return of the year, at the time when kings go out to battle, that Joab led forth the power of the army, and wasted the country of the children of Ammon, and came and besieged Rabbah. But David tarried at Jerusalem. And Joab smote Rabbah, and overthrew it. | וַיְהִי אַחֲרֵי-כֵן בָּאוּ בְנֵי-מוֹאָב וּבְנֵי עַמּוֹן וְעִמָּהֶם מֵהָעַמּוֹנִים, עַל-יְהוֹשָׁפָט--לַמִּלְחָמָה. | And it came to pass after this, that the children of Moab, and the children of Ammon, and with them some of the Ammonites, came against Jehoshaphat to battle.

text_he: ויקח דויד את-עטרת-מלכם מעל ראשו וימצאה משקל כר-זהב ובה אבן יקרה ותהי על-ראש דויד ושל העיר הוציא הרבה מאד | And David took the crown of Malcam from off his head and found it to weigh a talent of gold and there were precious stones in it and it was set upon David's head and he brought forth the spoil of the city exceeding much | ויבאו ויגידו ליהושפט לאמר בא עליך המון רב מעבר לים מארם והנם בחצון תמר היא עין גדי | Then there came some that told Jehoshaphat saying 'There cometh a great multitude against thee from beyond the sea from Aram and behold they are in Hazazon-tamar'--the same is En-gedi
text_en: And David took the crown of Malcam from off his head, and found it to weigh a talent of gold, and there were precious stones in it; and it was set upon David's head; and he brought forth the spoil of the city, exceeding much.
text_pisuk: וַיִּקַּח דָּוִיד אֶת-עֲטֶרֶת-מַלְכָּם מֵעַל רֹאשׁוֹ וַיִּמְצָאָהּ מִשְׁקַל כִּכַּר-זָהָב, וּבָהּ אֶבֶן יְקָרָה, וַתְּהִי, עַל-רֹאשׁ דָּוִיד; וּשְׁלַל הָעִיר הוֹצִיא, הַרְבֵּה מְאֹד. | And David took the crown of Malcam from off his head, and found it to weigh a talent of gold, and there were precious stones in it; and it was set upon David's head; and he brought forth the spoil of the city, exceeding much. | וַיָּבֹאוּ, וַיַּגִּידוּ לִיהוֹשָׁפָט לֵאמֹר, בָּא עָלֶיךָ הָמוֹן רָב מֵעֵבֶר לַיָּם, מֵאֲרָם; וְהִנָּם בְּחַצְצוֹן תָּמָר, הִיא עֵין גֶּדִי. | Then there came some that told Jehoshaphat, saying: 'There cometh a great multitude against thee from beyond the sea from Aram; and, behold, they are in Hazazon-tamar'--the same is En-gedi.

text_he: ואת-העם אשר-בה הוציא וישר במגרה ובחריצי הברזל ובמגרות וכן יעשה דויד לכל ערי בני-עמון וישב דויד וכל-העם ירושלם | And he brought forth the people that were therein and cut them with saws and with harrows of iron and with axes And thus did David unto all the cities of the children of Ammon And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem{S} | וירא ויתן יהושפט את-פניו לדרוש ליהוה ויקרא-צום על-כל-יהודה | And Jehoshaphat feared and set himself to seek unto the LORD and he proclaimed a fast throughout all Judah
text_en: And he brought forth the people that were therein, and cut them with saws, and with harrows of iron, and with axes. And thus did David unto all the cities of the children of Ammon. And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.{S}
text_pisuk: וְאֶת-הָעָם אֲשֶׁר-בָּהּ הוֹצִיא, וַיָּשַׂר בַּמְּגֵרָה וּבַחֲרִיצֵי הַבַּרְזֶל וּבַמְּגֵרוֹת, וְכֵן יַעֲשֶׂה דָוִיד, לְכֹל עָרֵי בְנֵי-עַמּוֹן; וַיָּשָׁב דָּוִיד וְכָל-הָעָם, יְרוּשָׁלִָם. | And he brought forth the people that were therein, and cut them with saws, and with harrows of iron, and with axes. And thus did David unto all the cities of the children of Ammon. And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.{S} | וַיִּרָא, וַיִּתֵּן יְהוֹשָׁפָט אֶת-פָּנָיו לִדְרוֹשׁ לַיהוָה; וַיִּקְרָא-צוֹם, עַל-כָּל-יְהוּדָה. | And Jehoshaphat feared, and set himself to seek unto the LORD; and he proclaimed a fast throughout all Judah.

text_he: ויהי אחרי-כן ותעמד מלחמה בגזר עם-פלשתים אז הכה סבכי החשתי את-ספי מילידי הרפאים--ויכנעו | And it came to pass after this that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines then Sibbecai the Hushathite slew Sippai of the sons of the giants and they were subdued | ויקבצו יהודה לבקש מיהוה גם מכל-ערי יהודה באו לבקש את-יהוה | And Judah gathered themselves together to seek help of the LORD even out of all the cities of Judah they came to seek the LORD
text_en: And it came to pass after this, that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines; then Sibbecai the Hushathite slew Sippai, of the sons of the giants; and they were subdued.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי, אַחֲרֵי-כֵן, וַתַּעֲמֹד מִלְחָמָה בְּגֶזֶר, עִם-פְּלִשְׁתִּים; אָז הִכָּה סִבְּכַי הַחֻשָׁתִי, אֶת-סִפַּי מִילִידֵי הָרְפָאִים--וַיִּכָּנֵעוּ. | And it came to pass after this, that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines; then Sibbecai the Hushathite slew Sippai, of the sons of the giants; and they were subdued. | וַיִּקָּבְצוּ יְהוּדָה, לְבַקֵּשׁ מֵיְהוָה; גַּם מִכָּל-עָרֵי יְהוּדָה, בָּאוּ לְבַקֵּשׁ אֶת-יְהוָה. | And Judah gathered themselves together, to seek help of the LORD; even out of all the cities of Judah they came to seek the LORD.

text_he: ותהי-עוד מלחמה את-פלשתים ויך אלחנן בן-יעור (יעיר) את-לחמי אחי גלית הגתי--ועץ חניתו כמנור ארגים | And there was again war with the Philistines and Elhanan the son of Jair slew Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite the staff of whose spear was like a weaver's beam{S} | ויעמד יהושפט בקהל יהודה וירושלם--בית יהוה לפני החצר החדשה | And Jehoshaphat stood in the congregation of Judah and Jerusalem in the house of the LORD before the new court
text_en: And there was again war with the Philistines; and Elhanan the son of Jair slew Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, the staff of whose spear was like a weaver's beam.{S}
text_pisuk: וַתְּהִי-עוֹד מִלְחָמָה, אֶת-פְּלִשְׁתִּים; וַיַּךְ אֶלְחָנָן בֶּן-יעור (יָעִיר), אֶת-לַחְמִי אֲחִי גָּלְיָת הַגִּתִּי--וְעֵץ חֲנִיתוֹ, כִּמְנוֹר אֹרְגִים. | And there was again war with the Philistines; and Elhanan the son of Jair slew Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, the staff of whose spear was like a weaver's beam.{S} | וַיַּעֲמֹד יְהוֹשָׁפָט, בִּקְהַל יְהוּדָה וִירוּשָׁלִַם--בְּבֵית יְהוָה: לִפְנֵי, הֶחָצֵר הַחֲדָשָׁה. | And Jehoshaphat stood in the congregation of Judah and Jerusalem, in the house of the LORD, before the new court;

text_he: ותהי-עוד מלחמה בגת ויהי איש מדה ואצבעתיו ש-וש עשרים וארבע וגם-הוא נולד להרפא | And there was again war at Gath where was a man of great stature whose fingers and toes were four and twenty six  and six  and he also was born unto the giant | ויאמר יהוה אלהי אבתינו הלא אתה-הוא אלהים בשמים ואתה מושל בכל מלכות הגוים ובידך כח וגבורה ואין עמך להתיצב | and he said 'O LORD the God of our fathers art not Thou alone God in heaven and art not Thou ruler over all the kingdoms of the nations and in Thy hand is power and might so that none is able to withstand Thee
text_en: And there was again war at Gath, where was a man of great stature, whose fingers and toes were four and twenty, six , and six ; and he also was born unto the giant.
text_pisuk: וַתְּהִי-עוֹד מִלְחָמָה, בְּגַת; וַיְהִי אִישׁ מִדָּה, וְאֶצְבְּעֹתָיו שֵׁשׁ-וָשֵׁשׁ עֶשְׂרִים וְאַרְבַּע, וְגַם-הוּא, נוֹלַד לְהָרָפָא. | And there was again war at Gath, where was a man of great stature, whose fingers and toes were four and twenty, six , and six ; and he also was born unto the giant. | וַיֹּאמַר, יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי אֲבֹתֵינוּ הֲלֹא אַתָּה-הוּא אֱלֹהִים בַּשָּׁמַיִם, וְאַתָּה מוֹשֵׁל, בְּכֹל מַמְלְכוֹת הַגּוֹיִם; וּבְיָדְךָ כֹּחַ וּגְבוּרָה, וְאֵין עִמְּךָ לְהִתְיַצֵּב. | and he said: 'O LORD, the God of our fathers, art not Thou alone God in heaven? and art not Thou ruler over all the kingdoms of the nations? and in Thy hand is power and might, so that none is able to withstand Thee.

text_he: ויחרף את-ישראל ויכהו יהונתן בן-שמעא אחי דויד | And when he taunted Israel Jonathan the son of Shimea David's brother slew him | הלא אתה אלהינו הורשת את-ישבי הארץ הזאת מלפני עמך ישראל ותנה לזרע אברהם אהבך--לעולם | Didst not Thou O our God drive out the inhabitants of this land before Thy people Israel and gavest it to the seed of Abraham Thy friend for ever
text_en: And when he taunted Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David's brother slew him.
text_pisuk: וַיְחָרֵף, אֶת-יִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיַּכֵּהוּ, יְהוֹנָתָן, בֶּן-שִׁמְעָא, אֲחִי דָוִיד. | And when he taunted Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David's brother slew him. | הֲלֹא אַתָּה אֱלֹהֵינוּ, הוֹרַשְׁתָּ אֶת-יֹשְׁבֵי הָאָרֶץ הַזֹּאת, מִלִּפְנֵי, עַמְּךָ יִשְׂרָאֵל; וַתִּתְּנָהּ, לְזֶרַע אַבְרָהָם אֹהַבְךָ--לְעוֹלָם. | Didst not Thou, O our God, drive out the inhabitants of this land before Thy people Israel, and gavest it to the seed of Abraham Thy friend for ever?

text_he: אל נולדו להרפא בגת ויפלו ביד-דויד וביד-עבדיו | These were born unto the giant in Gath and they fell by the hand of David and by the hand of his servants | וישבו-בה ויבנו לך בה מקדש לשמך לאמר | And they dwelt therein and have built Thee a sanctuary therein for Thy name saying
text_en: These were born unto the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David and by the hand of his servants.
text_pisuk: אֵל נוּלְּדוּ לְהָרָפָא, בְּגַת; וַיִּפְּלוּ בְיַד-דָּוִיד, וּבְיַד-עֲבָדָיו. | These were born unto the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David and by the hand of his servants. | וַיֵּשְׁבוּ-בָהּ; וַיִּבְנוּ לְךָ בָּהּ מִקְדָּשׁ, לְשִׁמְךָ לֵאמֹר. | And they dwelt therein, and have built Thee a sanctuary therein for Thy name, saying:

text_he: ויעמד שטן על-ישראל ויסת את-דויד למנות את-ישראל | And Satan stood up against Israel and moved David to number Israel | וישכב יהושפט עם-אבתיו ויקבר עם-אבתיו בעיר דויד וימלך יהורם בנו תחתיו | And Jehoshaphat slept with his fathers and was buried with his fathers in the city of David and Jehoram his son reigned in his stead
text_en: And Satan stood up against Israel, and moved David to number Israel.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעֲמֹד שָׂטָן, עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיָּסֶת, אֶת-דָּוִיד, לִמְנוֹת, אֶת-יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And Satan stood up against Israel, and moved David to number Israel. | וַיִּשְׁכַּב יְהוֹשָׁפָט עִם-אֲבֹתָיו, וַיִּקָּבֵר עִם-אֲבֹתָיו בְּעִיר דָּוִיד; וַיִּמְלֹךְ יְהוֹרָם בְּנוֹ, תַּחְתָּיו. | And Jehoshaphat slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David; and Jehoram his son reigned in his stead.

text_he: ויאמר דויד אל-יואב ואל-שרי העם לכו ספרו את-ישראל מבאר שבע ועד-דן והביאו אלי ואדעה את-מספרם | And David said to Joab and to the princes of the people 'Go number Israel from Beersheba even to Dan and bring me word that I may know the sum of them' | ולו-אחים בני יהושפט עזריה ויחיאל וזכריהו ועזריהו ומיכאל ושפטיהו כל-אלה בני יהושפט מלך-ישראל | And he had brethren the sons of Jehoshaphat Azariah and Jehiel and Zechariah and Azariahu and Michael and Shephatiah all these were the sons of Jehoshaphat king of Israel
text_en: And David said to Joab and to the princes of the people: 'Go, number Israel from Beersheba even to Dan; and bring me word, that I may know the sum of them.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד אֶל-יוֹאָב, וְאֶל-שָׂרֵי הָעָם, לְכוּ סִפְרוּ אֶת-יִשְׂרָאֵל, מִבְּאֵר שֶׁבַע וְעַד-דָּן; וְהָבִיאוּ אֵלַי, וְאֵדְעָה אֶת-מִסְפָּרָם. | And David said to Joab and to the princes of the people: 'Go, number Israel from Beersheba even to Dan; and bring me word, that I may know the sum of them.' | וְלוֹ-אַחִים בְּנֵי יְהוֹשָׁפָט, עֲזַרְיָה וִיחִיאֵל וּזְכַרְיָהוּ וַעֲזַרְיָהוּ, וּמִיכָאֵל, וּשְׁפַטְיָהוּ: כָּל-אֵלֶּה, בְּנֵי יְהוֹשָׁפָט מֶלֶךְ-יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And he had brethren the sons of Jehoshaphat, Azariah, and Jehiel, and Zechariah, and Azariahu, and Michael, and Shephatiah; all these were the sons of Jehoshaphat king of Israel.

text_he: ויאמר יואב יוסף יהוה על-עמו כהם מאה פעמים--הלא אדני המלך כלם לאדני לעבדים למה יבקש זאת אדני למה יהיה לאשמה לישראל | And Joab said 'The LORD make His people a hundred times so many more as they are but my lord the king are they not all my lord's servants why doth my lord require this thing why will he be a cause of guilt unto Israel' | ויתן להם אביהם מתנות רבות לכסף ולזהב ולמגדנות עם-ערי מצרות ביהודה ואת-המלכה נתן ליהורם כי-הוא הבכור | And their father gave them great gifts of silver and of gold and of precious things with fortified cities in Judah but the kingdom gave he to Jehoram because he was the first-born
text_en: And Joab said: 'The LORD make His people a hundred times so many more as they are; but, my lord the king, are they not all my lord's servants? why doth my lord require this thing? why will he be a cause of guilt unto Israel?'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר יוֹאָב, יוֹסֵף יְהוָה עַל-עַמּוֹ כָּהֵם מֵאָה פְעָמִים--הֲלֹא אֲדֹנִי הַמֶּלֶךְ, כֻּלָּם לַאדֹנִי לַעֲבָדִים; לָמָּה יְבַקֵּשׁ זֹאת אֲדֹנִי, לָמָּה יִהְיֶה לְאַשְׁמָה לְיִשְׂרָאֵל. | And Joab said: 'The LORD make His people a hundred times so many more as they are; but, my lord the king, are they not all my lord's servants? why doth my lord require this thing? why will he be a cause of guilt unto Israel?' | וַיִּתֵּן לָהֶם אֲבִיהֶם מַתָּנוֹת רַבּוֹת לְכֶסֶף וּלְזָהָב, וּלְמִגְדָּנוֹת, עִם-עָרֵי מְצֻרוֹת, בִּיהוּדָה; וְאֶת-הַמַּמְלָכָה נָתַן לִיהוֹרָם, כִּי-הוּא הַבְּכוֹר. | And their father gave them great gifts, of silver, and of gold, and of precious things, with fortified cities in Judah; but the kingdom gave he to Jehoram, because he was the first-born.

text_he: ודבר-המלך חזק על-יואב ויצא יואב ויתהלך בכל-ישראל ויבא ירושלם | Nevertheless the king's word prevailed against Joab Wherefore Joab departed and went throughout all Israel and came to Jerusalem | ויקם יהורם על-מלכת אביו ויתחזק ויהרג את-כל-אחיו בחרב וגם משרי ישראל | Now when Jehoram was risen up over the kingdom of his father and had strengthened himself he slew all his brethren with the sword and divers also of the princes of Israel
text_en: Nevertheless the king's word prevailed against Joab. Wherefore Joab departed and went throughout all Israel, and came to Jerusalem.
text_pisuk: וּדְבַר-הַמֶּלֶךְ, חָזַק עַל-יוֹאָב; וַיֵּצֵא יוֹאָב, וַיִּתְהַלֵּךְ בְּכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, וַיָּבֹא, יְרוּשָׁלִָם. | Nevertheless the king's word prevailed against Joab. Wherefore Joab departed and went throughout all Israel, and came to Jerusalem. | וַיָּקָם יְהוֹרָם עַל-מַמְלֶכֶת אָבִיו, וַיִּתְחַזַּק, וַיַּהֲרֹג אֶת-כָּל-אֶחָיו, בֶּחָרֶב; וְגַם, מִשָּׂרֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל. | Now when Jehoram was risen up over the kingdom of his father, and had strengthened himself, he slew all his brethren with the sword, and divers also of the princes of Israel.

text_he: ויתן יואב את-מספר מפקד-העם אל-דויד ויהי כל-ישראל אלף אלפים ומאה אלף איש שלף חרב ויהודה ארבע מאות ושבעים אלף איש שלף חרב | And Joab gave up the sum of the numbering of the people unto David And all they of Israel were a thousand thousand and a hundred thousand men that drew sword and Judah was four hundred three-score and ten thousand men that drew sword | בן-שלשים ושתים שנה יהורם במלכו ושמונה שנים מלך בירושלם | Jehoram was thirty and two years old when he began to reign and he reigned eight years in Jerusalem
text_en: And Joab gave up the sum of the numbering of the people unto David. And all they of Israel were a thousand thousand and a hundred thousand men that drew sword; and Judah was four hundred three-score and ten thousand men that drew sword.
text_pisuk: וַיִּתֵּן יוֹאָב אֶת-מִסְפַּר מִפְקַד-הָעָם, אֶל-דָּוִיד; וַיְהִי כָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶלֶף אֲלָפִים וּמֵאָה אֶלֶף אִישׁ, שֹׁלֵף חֶרֶב, וִיהוּדָה, אַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת וְשִׁבְעִים אֶלֶף אִישׁ שֹׁלֵף חָרֶב. | And Joab gave up the sum of the numbering of the people unto David. And all they of Israel were a thousand thousand and a hundred thousand men that drew sword; and Judah was four hundred three-score and ten thousand men that drew sword. | בֶּן-שְׁלֹשִׁים וּשְׁתַּיִם שָׁנָה, יְהוֹרָם בְּמָלְכוֹ; וּשְׁמוֹנֶה שָׁנִים, מָלַךְ בִּירוּשָׁלִָם. | Jehoram was thirty and two years old when he began to reign; and he reigned eight years in Jerusalem.

text_he: ולוי ובנימן לא פקד בתוכם כי-נתעב דבר-המלך את-יואב | But Levi and Benjamin he did not number among them for the king's word was abominable to Joab | וילך בדרך מלכי ישראל כאשר עשו בית אחאב--כי בת-אחאב היתה לו אשה ויעש הרע בעיני יהוה | And he walked in the way of the kings of Israel as did the house of Ahab for he had the daughter of Ahab to wife and he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD
text_en: But Levi and Benjamin he did not number among them; for the king's word was abominable to Joab.
text_pisuk: וְלֵוִי, וּבִנְיָמִן, לֹא פָקַד, בְּתוֹכָם: כִּי-נִתְעַב דְּבַר-הַמֶּלֶךְ, אֶת-יוֹאָב. | But Levi and Benjamin he did not number among them; for the king's word was abominable to Joab. | וַיֵּלֶךְ בְּדֶרֶךְ מַלְכֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, כַּאֲשֶׁר עָשׂוּ בֵּית אַחְאָב--כִּי בַּת-אַחְאָב, הָיְתָה לּוֹ אִשָּׁה; וַיַּעַשׂ הָרַע, בְּעֵינֵי יְהוָה. | And he walked in the way of the kings of Israel, as did the house of Ahab; for he had the daughter of Ahab to wife; and he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD.

text_he: וירע בעיני האלהים על-הדבר הזה ויך את-ישראל | And God was displeased with this thing therefore He smote Israel{S} | ולא-אבה יהוה להשחית את-בית דויד--למען הברית אשר כרת לדויד וכאשר אמר לת לו ניר ולבניו--כל-הימים | Howbeit the LORD would not destroy the house of David because of the covenant that He had made with David and as He promised to give a lamp to him and to his children alway
text_en: And God was displeased with this thing; therefore He smote Israel.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיֵּרַע בְּעֵינֵי הָאֱלֹהִים, עַל-הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה; וַיַּךְ, אֶת-יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And God was displeased with this thing; therefore He smote Israel.{S} | וְלֹא-אָבָה יְהוָה, לְהַשְׁחִית אֶת-בֵּית דָּוִיד--לְמַעַן הַבְּרִית, אֲשֶׁר כָּרַת לְדָוִיד; וְכַאֲשֶׁר אָמַר, לָתֵת לוֹ נִיר וּלְבָנָיו--כָּל-הַיָּמִים. | Howbeit the LORD would not destroy the house of David, because of the covenant that He had made with David, and as He promised to give a lamp to him and to his children alway.

text_he: ויאמר דויד אל-האלהים חטאתי מאד אשר עשיתי את-הדבר הזה ועתה העבר-נא את-עון עבדך כי נסכלתי מאד | And David said unto God 'I have sinned greatly in that I have done this thing but now put away I beseech Thee the iniquity of Thy servant for I have done very foolishly' | בימיו פשע אדום מתחת יד-יהודה וימליכו עליהם מלך | In his days Edom revolted from under the hand of Judah and made a king over themselves
text_en: And David said unto God: 'I have sinned greatly, in that I have done this thing; but now, put away, I beseech Thee, the iniquity of Thy servant; for I have done very foolishly.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד, אֶל-הָאֱלֹהִים, חָטָאתִי מְאֹד, אֲשֶׁר עָשִׂיתִי אֶת-הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה; וְעַתָּה, הַעֲבֶר-נָא אֶת-עֲווֹן עַבְדְּךָ, כִּי נִסְכַּלְתִּי, מְאֹד. | And David said unto God: 'I have sinned greatly, in that I have done this thing; but now, put away, I beseech Thee, the iniquity of Thy servant; for I have done very foolishly.' | בְּיָמָיו פָּשַׁע אֱדוֹם, מִתַּחַת יַד-יְהוּדָה; וַיַּמְלִיכוּ עֲלֵיהֶם, מֶלֶךְ. | In his days Edom revolted from under the hand of Judah, and made a king over themselves.

text_he: וידבר יהוה אל-גד חזה דויד לאמר | And the LORD spoke unto Gad David's seer saying | ויעבר יהורם עם-שריו וכל-הרכב עמו ויהי קם לילה ויך את-אדום הסוב אליו ואת שרי הרכב | Then Jehoram passed over with his captains and all his chariots with him and he rose up by night and smote the Edomites that compassed him about and the captains of the chariots
text_en: And the LORD spoke unto Gad, David's seer, saying:
text_pisuk: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל-גָּד, חֹזֵה דָוִיד לֵאמֹר. | And the LORD spoke unto Gad, David's seer, saying: | וַיַּעֲבֹר יְהוֹרָם עִם-שָׂרָיו, וְכָל-הָרֶכֶב עִמּוֹ; וַיְהִי, קָם לַיְלָה, וַיַּךְ אֶת-אֱדוֹם הַסּוֹבֵב אֵלָיו, וְאֵת שָׂרֵי הָרָכֶב. | Then Jehoram passed over with his captains, and all his chariots with him; and he rose up by night, and smote the Edomites that compassed him about, and the captains of the chariots.

text_he: לך ודברת אל-דויד לאמר כה אמר יהוה שלוש אני נטה עליך בחר-לך אחת מהנה ואעשה-לך | 'Go and speak unto David saying Thus saith the LORD I offer thee three things choose thee one of them that I may do it unto thee' | ויפשע אדום מתחת יד-יהודה עד היום הזה--אז תפשע לבנה בעת היא מתחת ידו כי עזב את-יהוה אלהי אבתיו | So Edom revolted from under the hand of Judah unto this day then did Libnah revolt at the same time from under his hand because he had forsaken the LORD the God of his fathers
text_en: 'Go and speak unto David, saying: Thus saith the LORD: I offer thee three things; choose thee one of them, that I may do it unto thee.'
text_pisuk: לֵךְ וְדִבַּרְתָּ אֶל-דָּוִיד לֵאמֹר, כֹּה אָמַר יְהוָה, שָׁלוֹשׁ, אֲנִי נֹטֶה עָלֶיךָ: בְּחַר-לְךָ אַחַת מֵהֵנָּה, וְאֶעֱשֶׂה-לָּךְ. | 'Go and speak unto David, saying: Thus saith the LORD: I offer thee three things; choose thee one of them, that I may do it unto thee.' | וַיִּפְשַׁע אֱדוֹם מִתַּחַת יַד-יְהוּדָה, עַד הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה--אָז תִּפְשַׁע לִבְנָה בָּעֵת הַהִיא, מִתַּחַת יָדוֹ: כִּי עָזַב, אֶת-יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי אֲבֹתָיו. | So Edom revolted from under the hand of Judah unto this day; then did Libnah revolt at the same time from under his hand; because he had forsaken the LORD, the God of his fathers.

text_he: ויבא גד אל-דויד ויאמר לו כה-אמר יהוה קבל-לך | So Gad came to David and said unto him 'Thus saith the LORD Take which thou wilt | גם-הוא עשה-במות בהרי יהודה ויזן את-ישבי ירושלם וידח את-יהודה | Moreover he made high places in the mountains of Judah and made the inhabitants of Jerusalem to go astray and drew Judah away
text_en: So Gad came to David, and said unto him: 'Thus saith the LORD: Take which thou wilt:
text_pisuk: וַיָּבֹא גָד, אֶל-דָּוִיד; וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ כֹּה-אָמַר יְהוָה, קַבֶּל-לָךְ. | So Gad came to David, and said unto him: 'Thus saith the LORD: Take which thou wilt: | גַּם-הוּא עָשָׂה-בָמוֹת, בְּהָרֵי יְהוּדָה; וַיֶּזֶן אֶת-יֹשְׁבֵי יְרוּשָׁלִַם, וַיַּדַּח אֶת-יְהוּדָה. | Moreover he made high places in the mountains of Judah, and made the inhabitants of Jerusalem to go astray, and drew Judah away.

text_he: אם-שלוש שנים רעב ואם-שלשה חדשים נספה מפני-צריך וחרב אויביך למשגת ואם-שלשת ימים חרב יהוה ודבר בארץ ומלאך יהוה משחית בכל-גבול ישראל ועתה ראה מה-אשיב את-שלחי דבר | either three years of famine or three months to be swept away before thy foes while the sword of thine enemies overtaketh thee or else three days the sword of the LORD even pestilence in the land and the angel of the LORD destroying throughout all the borders of Israel Now therefore consider what answer I shall return to Him that sent me'{S} | ויבא אליו מכתב מאליהו הנביא לאמר כה אמר יהוה אלהי דויד אביך--תחת אשר לא-הלכת בדרכי יהושפט אביך ובדרכי אסא מלך-יהודה | And there came a writing to him from Elijah the prophet saying 'Thus saith the LORD the God of David thy father Because thou hast not walked in the ways of Jehoshaphat thy father nor in the ways of Asa king of Judah
text_en: either three years of famine; or three months to be swept away before thy foes, while the sword of thine enemies overtaketh thee; or else three days the sword of the LORD, even pestilence in the land, and the angel of the LORD destroying throughout all the borders of Israel. Now therefore consider what answer I shall return to Him that sent me.'{S}
text_pisuk: אִם-שָׁלוֹשׁ שָׁנִים רָעָב, וְאִם-שְׁלֹשָׁה חֳדָשִׁים נִסְפֶּה מִפְּנֵי-צָרֶיךָ וְחֶרֶב אוֹיְבֶיךָ לְמַשֶּׂגֶת, וְאִם-שְׁלֹשֶׁת יָמִים חֶרֶב יְהוָה וְדֶבֶר בָּאָרֶץ, וּמַלְאַךְ יְהוָה מַשְׁחִית בְּכָל-גְּבוּל יִשְׂרָאֵל: וְעַתָּה רְאֵה, מָה-אָשִׁיב אֶת-שֹׁלְחִי דָּבָר. | either three years of famine; or three months to be swept away before thy foes, while the sword of thine enemies overtaketh thee; or else three days the sword of the LORD, even pestilence in the land, and the angel of the LORD destroying throughout all the borders of Israel. Now therefore consider what answer I shall return to Him that sent me.'{S} | וַיָּבֹא אֵלָיו מִכְתָּב, מֵאֵלִיָּהוּ הַנָּבִיא לֵאמֹר: כֹּה אָמַר יְהוָה, אֱלֹהֵי דָּוִיד אָבִיךָ--תַּחַת אֲשֶׁר לֹא-הָלַכְתָּ בְּדַרְכֵי יְהוֹשָׁפָט אָבִיךָ, וּבְדַרְכֵי אָסָא מֶלֶךְ-יְהוּדָה. | And there came a writing to him from Elijah the prophet, saying: 'Thus saith the LORD, the God of David thy father: Because thou hast not walked in the ways of Jehoshaphat thy father, nor in the ways of Asa king of Judah;

text_he: ויאמר דויד אל-גד צר-לי מאד אפלה-נא ביד-יהוה כי-רבים רחמיו מאד וביד-אדם אל-אפל | And David said unto Gad 'I am in a great strait let me fall now into the hand of the LORD for very great are His mercies and let me not fall into the hand of man' | ותלך בדרך מלכי ישראל ותזנה את-יהודה ואת-ישבי ירושלם כהזנות בית אחאב וגם את-אחיך בית-אביך הטובים מך הרגת | but hast walked in the way of the kings of Israel and hast made Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem to go astray like as the house of Ahab made to go astray and also hast slain thy brethren of thy father's house who were better than thyself
text_en: And David said unto Gad: 'I am in a great strait; let me fall now into the hand of the LORD, for very great are His mercies; and let me not fall into the hand of man.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד אֶל-גָּד, צַר-לִי מְאֹד; אֶפְּלָה-נָּא בְיַד-יְהוָה, כִּי-רַבִּים רַחֲמָיו מְאֹד, וּבְיַד-אָדָם, אַל-אֶפֹּל. | And David said unto Gad: 'I am in a great strait; let me fall now into the hand of the LORD, for very great are His mercies; and let me not fall into the hand of man.' | וַתֵּלֶךְ, בְּדֶרֶךְ מַלְכֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וַתַּזְנֶה אֶת-יְהוּדָה וְאֶת-יֹשְׁבֵי יְרוּשָׁלִַם, כְּהַזְנוֹת בֵּית אַחְאָב; וְגַם אֶת-אַחֶיךָ בֵית-אָבִיךָ הַטּוֹבִים מִמְּךָ, הָרָגְתָּ. | but hast walked in the way of the kings of Israel, and hast made Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem to go astray, like as the house of Ahab made to go astray; and also hast slain thy brethren of thy father's house, who were better than thyself;

text_he: ויתן יהוה דבר בישראל ויפל מישראל שבעים אלף איש | So the LORD sent a pestilence upon Israel and there fell of Israel seventy thousand men | הנה יהוה נגף מגפה גדולה--בעמך ובניך ובנשיך ובכל-רכושך | behold the LORD will smite with a great plague thy people and thy children and thy wives and all thy substance
text_en: So the LORD sent a pestilence upon Israel; and there fell of Israel seventy thousand men.
text_pisuk: וַיִּתֵּן יְהוָה דֶּבֶר, בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיִּפֹּל, מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל, שִׁבְעִים אֶלֶף, אִישׁ. | So the LORD sent a pestilence upon Israel; and there fell of Israel seventy thousand men. | הִנֵּה יְהוָה, נֹגֵף מַגֵּפָה גְדוֹלָה--בְּעַמֶּךָ; וּבְבָנֶיךָ וּבְנָשֶׁיךָ, וּבְכָל-רְכוּשֶׁךָ. | behold, the LORD will smite with a great plague thy people, and thy children, and thy wives, and all thy substance;

text_he: וישלח האלהים מלאך לירושלם להשחיתה וכהשחית ראה יהוה וינחם על-הרעה ויאמר למלאך המשחית רב עתה הרף ידך ומלאך יהוה עמד עם-גרן ארנן היבוסי | And God sent an angel unto Jerusalem to destroy it and as he was about to destroy the LORD beheld and He repented Him of the evil and said to the destroying angel 'It is enough now stay thy hand' And the angel of the LORD was standing by the threshing-floor of Ornan the Jebusite{S} | ואתה בחלים רבים במחלה מעיך עד-יצאו מעיך מן-החלי ימים על-ימים | and thou shalt have great sickness by disease of thy bowels until thy bowels fall out by reason of the sickness day by day'
text_en: And God sent an angel unto Jerusalem to destroy it; and as he was about to destroy, the LORD beheld, and He repented Him of the evil, and said to the destroying angel: 'It is enough; now stay thy hand.' And the angel of the LORD was standing by the threshing-floor of Ornan the Jebusite.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁלַח הָאֱלֹהִים מַלְאָךְ לִירוּשָׁלִַם, לְהַשְׁחִיתָהּ, וּכְהַשְׁחִית רָאָה יְהוָה וַיִּנָּחֶם עַל-הָרָעָה, וַיֹּאמֶר לַמַּלְאָךְ הַמַּשְׁחִית רַב עַתָּה הֶרֶף יָדֶךָ; וּמַלְאַךְ יְהוָה עֹמֵד, עִם-גֹּרֶן אָרְנָן הַיְבוּסִי. | And God sent an angel unto Jerusalem to destroy it; and as he was about to destroy, the LORD beheld, and He repented Him of the evil, and said to the destroying angel: 'It is enough; now stay thy hand.' And the angel of the LORD was standing by the threshing-floor of Ornan the Jebusite.{S} | וְאַתָּה בָּחֳלָיִים רַבִּים, בְּמַחֲלֵה מֵעֶיךָ, עַד-יֵצְאוּ מֵעֶיךָ מִן-הַחֹלִי, יָמִים עַל-יָמִים. | and thou shalt have great sickness by disease of thy bowels, until thy bowels fall out by reason of the sickness, day by day.'

text_he: וישא דויד את-עיניו וירא את-מלאך יהוה עמד בין הארץ ובין השמים וחרבו שלופה בידו נטויה על-ירושלם ויפל דויד והזקנים מכסים בשקים על-פניהם | And David lifted up his eyes and saw the angel of the LORD standing between the earth and the heaven having a drawn sword in his hand stretched out over Jerusalem Then David and the elders clothed in sackcloth fell upon their faces | ויער יהוה על-יהורם את רוח הפלשתים והערבים אשר על-יד כושים | And the LORD stirred up against Jehoram the spirit of the Philistines and of the Arabians that are beside the Ethiopians
text_en: And David lifted up his eyes, and saw the angel of the LORD standing between the earth and the heaven, having a drawn sword in his hand stretched out over Jerusalem. Then David and the elders, clothed in sackcloth, fell upon their faces.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשָּׂא דָוִיד אֶת-עֵינָיו, וַיַּרְא אֶת-מַלְאַךְ יְהוָה עֹמֵד בֵּין הָאָרֶץ וּבֵין הַשָּׁמַיִם, וְחַרְבּוֹ שְׁלוּפָה בְּיָדוֹ, נְטוּיָה עַל-יְרוּשָׁלִָם; וַיִּפֹּל דָּוִיד וְהַזְּקֵנִים מְכֻסִּים בַּשַּׂקִּים, עַל-פְּנֵיהֶם. | And David lifted up his eyes, and saw the angel of the LORD standing between the earth and the heaven, having a drawn sword in his hand stretched out over Jerusalem. Then David and the elders, clothed in sackcloth, fell upon their faces. | וַיָּעַר יְהוָה עַל-יְהוֹרָם, אֵת רוּחַ הַפְּלִשְׁתִּים וְהָעַרְבִים, אֲשֶׁר, עַל-יַד כּוּשִׁים. | And the LORD stirred up against Jehoram the spirit of the Philistines, and of the Arabians that are beside the Ethiopians;

text_he: ויאמר דויד אל-האלהים הלא אני אמרתי למנות בעם ואני-הוא אשר-חטאתי והרע הרעותי ואלה הצאן מה עשו יהוה אלהי תהי נא ידך בי ובית אבי ובעמך לא למגפה | And David said unto God 'Is it not I that commanded the people to be numbered even I it is that have sinned and done very wickedly but these sheep what have they done let Thy hand I pray Thee O LORD my God be against me and against my father's house but not against Thy people that they should be plagued'{S} | ויעלו ביהודה ויבקעוה וישבו את כל-הרכוש הנמצא לבית-המלך וגם-בניו ונשיו ולא נשאר-לו בן כי אם-יהואחז קטן בניו | and they came up against Judah and broke into it and carried away all the substance that was found in the king's house and his sons also and his wives so that there was never a son left him save Jehoahaz the youngest of his sons
text_en: And David said unto God: 'Is it not I that commanded the people to be numbered? even I it is that have sinned and done very wickedly; but these sheep, what have they done? let Thy hand, I pray Thee, O LORD my God, be against me, and against my father's house; but not against Thy people, that they should be plagued.'{S}
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד אֶל-הָאֱלֹהִים הֲלֹא אֲנִי אָמַרְתִּי לִמְנוֹת בָּעָם, וַאֲנִי-הוּא אֲשֶׁר-חָטָאתִי וְהָרֵעַ הֲרֵעוֹתִי, וְאֵלֶּה הַצֹּאן, מֶה עָשׂוּ; יְהוָה אֱלֹהַי, תְּהִי נָא יָדְךָ בִּי וּבְבֵית אָבִי, וּבְעַמְּךָ, לֹא לְמַגֵּפָה. | And David said unto God: 'Is it not I that commanded the people to be numbered? even I it is that have sinned and done very wickedly; but these sheep, what have they done? let Thy hand, I pray Thee, O LORD my God, be against me, and against my father's house; but not against Thy people, that they should be plagued.'{S} | וַיַּעֲלוּ בִיהוּדָה, וַיִּבְקָעוּהָ, וַיִּשְׁבּוּ אֵת כָּל-הָרְכוּשׁ הַנִּמְצָא לְבֵית-הַמֶּלֶךְ, וְגַם-בָּנָיו וְנָשָׁיו; וְלֹא נִשְׁאַר-לוֹ בֵּן, כִּי אִם-יְהוֹאָחָז קְטֹן בָּנָיו. | and they came up against Judah, and broke into it, and carried away all the substance that was found in the king's house, and his sons also, and his wives; so that there was never a son left him, save Jehoahaz, the youngest of his sons.

text_he: ומלאך יהוה אמר אל-גד לאמר לדויד כי יעלה דויד להקים מזבח ליהוה בגרן ארנן היבסי | Then the angel of the LORD commanded Gad to say to David that David should go up and rear an altar unto the LORD in the threshing-floor of Ornan the Jebusite | ואחרי כל-זאת--נגפו יהוה במעיו לחלי לאין מרפא | And after all this the LORD smote him in his bowels with an incurable disease
text_en: Then the angel of the LORD commanded Gad to say to David, that David should go up, and rear an altar unto the LORD in the threshing-floor of Ornan the Jebusite.
text_pisuk: וּמַלְאַךְ יְהוָה אָמַר אֶל-גָּד, לֵאמֹר לְדָוִיד: כִּי יַעֲלֶה דָוִיד, לְהָקִים מִזְבֵּחַ לַיהוָה, בְּגֹרֶן, אָרְנָן הַיְבֻסִי. | Then the angel of the LORD commanded Gad to say to David, that David should go up, and rear an altar unto the LORD in the threshing-floor of Ornan the Jebusite. | וְאַחֲרֵי, כָּל-זֹאת--נְגָפוֹ יְהוָה בְּמֵעָיו לָחֳלִי, לְאֵין מַרְפֵּא. | And after all this the LORD smote him in his bowels with an incurable disease.

text_he: ויעל דויד בדבר-גד אשר דבר בשם יהוה | And David went up at the saying of Gad which he spoke in the name of the LORD | ויהי לימים מימים וכעת צאת הקץ לימים שנים יצאו מעיו עם-חליו וימת בתחלאים רעים ולא-עשו לו עמו שרפה כשרפת אבתיו | And it came to pass that in process of time at the end of two years his bowels fell out by reason of his sickness and he died of sore diseases And his people made no burning for him like the burning of his fathers
text_en: And David went up at the saying of Gad, which he spoke in the name of the LORD.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַל דָּוִיד בִּדְבַר-גָּד, אֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר בְּשֵׁם יְהוָה. | And David went up at the saying of Gad, which he spoke in the name of the LORD. | וַיְהִי לְיָמִים מִיָּמִים וּכְעֵת צֵאת הַקֵּץ לְיָמִים שְׁנַיִם, יָצְאוּ מֵעָיו עִם-חָלְיוֹ, וַיָּמָת, בְּתַחֲלֻאִים רָעִים; וְלֹא-עָשׂוּ לוֹ עַמּוֹ שְׂרֵפָה, כִּשְׂרֵפַת אֲבֹתָיו. | And it came to pass, that in process of time, at the end of two years, his bowels fell out by reason of his sickness, and he died of sore diseases. And his people made no burning for him, like the burning of his fathers.

text_he: וישב ארנן וירא את-המלאך וארבעת בניו עמו מתחבאים וארנן דש חטים | And Ornan turned back and saw the angel and his four sons that were with him hid themselves Now Ornan was threshing wheat | בן-שלשים ושתים היה במלכו ושמונה שנים מלך בירושלם וילך בלא חמדה ויקברהו בעיר דויד ולא בקברות המלכים | Thirty and two years old was he when he began to reign and he reigned in Jerusalem eight years and he departed joyless and they buried him in the city of David but not in the sepulchres of the kings
text_en: And Ornan turned back, and saw the angel; and his four sons that were with him hid themselves. Now Ornan was threshing wheat.
text_pisuk: וַיָּשָׁב אָרְנָן, וַיַּרְא אֶת-הַמַּלְאָךְ, וְאַרְבַּעַת בָּנָיו עִמּוֹ, מִתְחַבְּאִים; וְאָרְנָן, דָּשׁ חִטִּים. | And Ornan turned back, and saw the angel; and his four sons that were with him hid themselves. Now Ornan was threshing wheat. | בֶּן-שְׁלֹשִׁים וּשְׁתַּיִם, הָיָה בְמָלְכוֹ, וּשְׁמוֹנֶה שָׁנִים, מָלַךְ בִּירוּשָׁלִָם; וַיֵּלֶךְ, בְּלֹא חֶמְדָּה, וַיִּקְבְּרֻהוּ בְּעִיר דָּוִיד, וְלֹא בְּקִבְרוֹת הַמְּלָכִים. | Thirty and two years old was he when he began to reign, and he reigned in Jerusalem eight years; and he departed joyless; and they buried him in the city of David, but not in the sepulchres of the kings.

text_he: ויבא דויד עד-ארנן ויבט ארנן וירא את-דויד ויצא מן-הגרן וישתחו לדויד אפים ארצה
text_en: And as David came to Ornan, Ornan looked and saw David, and went out of the threshing-floor, and bowed down to David with his face to the ground.
text_pisuk: וַיָּבֹא דָוִיד, עַד-אָרְנָן; וַיַּבֵּט אָרְנָן, וַיַּרְא אֶת-דָּוִיד, וַיֵּצֵא מִן-הַגֹּרֶן, וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ לְדָוִיד אַפַּיִם אָרְצָה.

text_he: ויאמר דויד אל-ארנן תנה-לי מקום הגרן ואבנה-בו מזבח ליהוה בכסף מלא תנהו לי ותעצר המגפה מעל העם
text_en: Then David said to Ornan: 'Give me the place of this threshing-floor, that I may build thereon an altar unto the LORD; for the full price shalt thou give it me; that the plague may be stayed from the people.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד אֶל-אָרְנָן, תְּנָה-לִּי מְקוֹם הַגֹּרֶן, וְאֶבְנֶה-בּוֹ מִזְבֵּחַ, לַיהוָה; בְּכֶסֶף מָלֵא תְּנֵהוּ לִי, וְתֵעָצַר הַמַּגֵּפָה מֵעַל הָעָם.

text_he: ויאמר ארנן אל-דויד קח-לך ויעש אדני המלך הטוב בעיניו ראה נתי הבקר לעלות והמורגים לעצים והחטים למנחה--הכל נתי
text_en: And Ornan said unto David: 'Take it to thee, and let my lord the king do that which is good in his eyes; lo, I give thee the oxen for burnt-offerings, and the threshing-instruments for wood, and the wheat for the meal-offering; I give it all'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר אָרְנָן אֶל-דָּוִיד קַח-לָךְ, וְיַעַשׂ אֲדֹנִי הַמֶּלֶךְ הַטּוֹב בְּעֵינָיו; רְאֵה נָתַתִּי הַבָּקָר לָעֹלוֹת, וְהַמּוֹרִגִּים לָעֵצִים וְהַחִטִּים לַמִּנְחָה--הַכֹּל נָתָתִּי.

text_he: ויאמר המלך דויד לארנן לא כי-קנה אקנה בכסף מלא כי לא-אשא אשר-לך ליהוה והעלות עולה חנם
text_en: And king David said to Ornan: 'Nay, but I will verily buy it for the full price; for I will not take that which is thine for the LORD, nor offer a burnt-offering without cost.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר הַמֶּלֶךְ דָּוִיד, לְאָרְנָן, לֹא, כִּי-קָנֹה אֶקְנֶה בְּכֶסֶף מָלֵא: כִּי לֹא-אֶשָּׂא אֲשֶׁר-לְךָ, לַיהוָה, וְהַעֲלוֹת עוֹלָה, חִנָּם.

text_he: ויתן דויד לארנן במקום שקלי זהב משקל ש מאות
text_en: So David gave to Ornan for the place six hundred shekels of gold by weight.
text_pisuk: וַיִּתֵּן דָּוִיד לְאָרְנָן, בַּמָּקוֹם, שִׁקְלֵי זָהָב, מִשְׁקָל שֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת.

text_he: ויבן שם דויד מזבח ליהוה ויעל עלות ושלמים ויקרא אל-יהוה ויענהו באש מן-השמים על מזבח העלה
text_en: And David built there an altar unto the LORD, and offered burnt-offerings and peace-offerings, and called upon the LORD; and He answered him from heaven by fire upon the altar of burnt-offering.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן שָׁם דָּוִיד מִזְבֵּחַ לַיהוָה, וַיַּעַל עֹלוֹת וּשְׁלָמִים; וַיִּקְרָא, אֶל-יְהוָה, וַיַּעֲנֵהוּ בָאֵשׁ מִן-הַשָּׁמַיִם, עַל מִזְבַּח הָעֹלָה.

text_he: ויאמר יהוה למלאך וישב חרבו אל-נדנה
text_en: And the LORD commanded the angel; and he put up his sword back into the sheath thereof.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה לַמַּלְאָךְ, וַיָּשֶׁב חַרְבּוֹ אֶל-נְדָנָהּ.

text_he: בעת היא--בראות דויד כי-ענהו יהוה בגרן ארנן היבוסי ויזבח שם
text_en: At that time, when David saw that the LORD had answered him in the threshing-floor of Ornan the Jebusite, then he sacrificed there.
text_pisuk: בָּעֵת הַהִיא--בִּרְאוֹת דָּוִיד כִּי-עָנָהוּ יְהוָה, בְּגֹרֶן אָרְנָן הַיְבוּסִי; וַיִּזְבַּח, שָׁם.

text_he: ומשכן יהוה אשר-עשה משה במדבר ומזבח העולה--בעת היא במה בגבעון
text_en: For the tabernacle of the LORD, which Moses made in the wilderness, and the altar of burnt-offering, were at that time in the high place at Gibeon.
text_pisuk: וּמִשְׁכַּן יְהוָה אֲשֶׁר-עָשָׂה מֹשֶׁה בַמִּדְבָּר, וּמִזְבַּח הָעוֹלָה--בָּעֵת הַהִיא: בַּבָּמָה, בְּגִבְעוֹן.

text_he: ולא-יכל דויד לכת לפניו לדרש אלהים כי נבעת--מפני חרב מלאך יהוה
text_en: But David could not go before it to inquire of God; for he was terrified because of the sword of the angel of the LORD.{S}
text_pisuk: וְלֹא-יָכֹל דָּוִיד לָלֶכֶת לְפָנָיו, לִדְרֹשׁ אֱלֹהִים: כִּי נִבְעַת--מִפְּנֵי, חֶרֶב מַלְאַךְ יְהוָה.

text_he: ויאמר דויד--זה הוא בית יהוה האלהים וזה-מזבח לעלה לישראל | Then David said 'This is the house of the LORD God and this is the altar of burnt-offering for Israel' | וימליכו יושבי ירושלם את-אחזיהו בנו הקטן תחתיו--כי כל-הראשנים הרג הגדוד הבא בערבים למחנה וימלך אחזיהו בן-יהורם מלך יהודה | And the inhabitants of Jerusalem made Ahaziah his youngest son king in his stead for the band of men that came with the Arabians to the camp had slain all the eldest So Ahaziah the son of Jehoram king of Judah reigned
text_en: Then David said: 'This is the house of the LORD God, and this is the altar of burnt-offering for Israel.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד--זֶה הוּא, בֵּית יְהוָה הָאֱלֹהִים; וְזֶה-מִּזְבֵּחַ לְעֹלָה, לְיִשְׂרָאֵל. | Then David said: 'This is the house of the LORD God, and this is the altar of burnt-offering for Israel.' | וַיַּמְלִיכוּ יוֹשְׁבֵי יְרוּשָׁלִַם אֶת-אֲחַזְיָהוּ בְנוֹ הַקָּטֹן, תַּחְתָּיו--כִּי כָל-הָרִאשֹׁנִים הָרַג הַגְּדוּד, הַבָּא בָעַרְבִים לַמַּחֲנֶה; וַיִּמְלֹךְ אֲחַזְיָהוּ בֶן-יְהוֹרָם, מֶלֶךְ יְהוּדָה. | And the inhabitants of Jerusalem made Ahaziah his youngest son king in his stead; for the band of men that came with the Arabians to the camp had slain all the eldest. So Ahaziah the son of Jehoram king of Judah reigned.

text_he: ויאמר דויד--לכנוס את-הגרים אשר בארץ ישראל ויעמד חצבים לחצוב אבני גזית לבנות בית האלהים | And David commanded to gather together the strangers that were in the land of Israel and he set masons to hew wrought stones to build the house of God | בן-ארבעים ושתים שנה אחזיהו במלכו ושנה אחת מלך בירושלם ושם אמו עתליהו בת-עמרי | Forty and two years old was Ahaziah when he began to reign and he reigned one year in Jerusalem and his mother's name was Athaliah the daughter of Omri
text_en: And David commanded to gather together the strangers that were in the land of Israel; and he set masons to hew wrought stones to build the house of God.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד--לִכְנוֹס אֶת-הַגֵּרִים, אֲשֶׁר בְּאֶרֶץ יִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיַּעֲמֵד חֹצְבִים, לַחְצוֹב אַבְנֵי גָזִית, לִבְנוֹת, בֵּית הָאֱלֹהִים. | And David commanded to gather together the strangers that were in the land of Israel; and he set masons to hew wrought stones to build the house of God. | בֶּן-אַרְבָּעִים וּשְׁתַּיִם שָׁנָה, אֲחַזְיָהוּ בְמָלְכוֹ, וְשָׁנָה אַחַת, מָלַךְ בִּירוּשָׁלִָם; וְשֵׁם אִמּוֹ, עֲתַלְיָהוּ בַּת-עָמְרִי. | Forty and two years old was Ahaziah when he began to reign; and he reigned one year in Jerusalem; and his mother's name was Athaliah the daughter of Omri.

text_he: וברזל לרב למסמרים לדלתות השערים ולמחברות--הכין דויד ונחשת לרב אין משקל | And David prepared iron in abundance for the nails for the doors of the gates and for the couplings and brass in abundance without weight | גם-הוא הלך בדרכי בית אחאב כי אמו היתה יועצתו להרשיע | He also walked in the ways of the house of Ahab for his mother was his counsellor to do wickedly
text_en: And David prepared iron in abundance for the nails for the doors of the gates, and for the couplings; and brass in abundance without weight;
text_pisuk: וּבַרְזֶל לָרֹב לַמִּסְמְרִים לְדַלְתוֹת הַשְּׁעָרִים, וְלַמְחַבְּרוֹת--הֵכִין דָּוִיד; וּנְחֹשֶׁת לָרֹב, אֵין מִשְׁקָל. | And David prepared iron in abundance for the nails for the doors of the gates, and for the couplings; and brass in abundance without weight; | גַּם-הוּא הָלַךְ, בְּדַרְכֵי בֵּית אַחְאָב: כִּי אִמּוֹ הָיְתָה יוֹעַצְתּוֹ, לְהַרְשִׁיעַ. | He also walked in the ways of the house of Ahab; for his mother was his counsellor to do wickedly.

text_he: ועצי ארזים לאין מספר כי-הביאו הצידנים והצרים עצי ארזים לרב--לדויד | and cedar-trees without number for the Zidonians and they of Tyre brought cedar-trees in abundance to David | ויעש הרע בעיני יהוה כבית אחאב כי-המה היו-לו יועצים אחרי מות אביו--למשחית לו | And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD as did the house of Ahab for they were his counsellors after the death of his father to his destruction
text_en: and cedar-trees without number; for the Zidonians and they of Tyre brought cedar-trees in abundance to David.
text_pisuk: וַעֲצֵי אֲרָזִים, לְאֵין מִסְפָּר: כִּי-הֵבִיאוּ הַצִּידֹנִים וְהַצֹּרִים עֲצֵי אֲרָזִים, לָרֹב--לְדָוִיד. | and cedar-trees without number; for the Zidonians and they of Tyre brought cedar-trees in abundance to David. | וַיַּעַשׂ הָרַע בְּעֵינֵי יְהוָה, כְּבֵית אַחְאָב: כִּי-הֵמָּה הָיוּ-לוֹ יוֹעֲצִים, אַחֲרֵי מוֹת אָבִיו--לְמַשְׁחִית לוֹ. | And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, as did the house of Ahab; for they were his counsellors after the death of his father, to his destruction.

text_he: ויאמר דויד שלמה בני נער ורך והבית לבנות ליהוה להגדיל למעלה לשם ולתפארת לכל-הארצות אכינה נא לו ויכן דויד לרב לפני מותו | And David said 'Solomon my son is young and tender and the house that is to be builded for the LORD must be exceeding magnificent of fame and of glory throughout all countries I will therefore make preparation for him' So David prepared abundantly before his death | גם בעצתם הלך וילך את-יהורם בן-אחאב מלך ישראל למלחמה על-חזאל מלך-ארם ברמות גלעד ויכו הרמים את-יורם | He walked also after their counsel and went with Jehoram the son of Ahab king of Israel to war against Hazael king of Aram at Ramoth-gilead and the Arameans wounded Joram
text_en: And David said: 'Solomon my son is young and tender, and the house that is to be builded for the LORD must be exceeding magnificent, of fame and of glory throughout all countries; I will therefore make preparation for him.' So David prepared abundantly before his death.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד, שְׁלֹמֹה בְנִי נַעַר וָרָךְ, וְהַבַּיִת לִבְנוֹת לַיהוָה לְהַגְדִּיל לְמַעְלָה לְשֵׁם וּלְתִפְאֶרֶת לְכָל-הָאֲרָצוֹת, אָכִינָה נָּא לוֹ; וַיָּכֶן דָּוִיד לָרֹב, לִפְנֵי מוֹתוֹ. | And David said: 'Solomon my son is young and tender, and the house that is to be builded for the LORD must be exceeding magnificent, of fame and of glory throughout all countries; I will therefore make preparation for him.' So David prepared abundantly before his death. | גַּם בַּעֲצָתָם, הָלַךְ, וַיֵּלֶךְ אֶת-יְהוֹרָם בֶּן-אַחְאָב מֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל לַמִּלְחָמָה עַל-חֲזָאֵל מֶלֶךְ-אֲרָם, בְּרָמוֹת גִּלְעָד; וַיַּכּוּ הָרַמִּים, אֶת-יוֹרָם. | He walked also after their counsel, and went with Jehoram the son of Ahab king of Israel to war against Hazael king of Aram at Ramoth-gilead; and the Arameans wounded Joram.

text_he: ויקרא לשלמה בנו ויצוהו לבנות בית ליהוה אלהי ישראל | Then He called for Solomon his son and charged him to build a house for the LORD the God of Israel{S} | וישב להתרפא ביזרעאל כי המכים אשר הכהו ברמה בהלחמו את-חזהאל מלך ארם ועזריהו בן-יהורם מלך יהודה ירד לראות את-יהורם בן-אחאב ביזרעאל--כי-חלה הוא | And he returned to be healed in Jezreel of the wounds which they had given him at Ramah when he fought against Hazael king of Aram And Azariah the son of Jehoram king of Judah went down to see Jehoram the son of Ahab in Jezreel because he was sick
text_en: Then He called for Solomon his son, and charged him to build a house for the LORD, the God of Israel.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּקְרָא, לִשְׁלֹמֹה בְנוֹ; וַיְצַוֵּהוּ לִבְנוֹת בַּיִת, לַיהוָה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל. | Then He called for Solomon his son, and charged him to build a house for the LORD, the God of Israel.{S} | וַיָּשָׁב לְהִתְרַפֵּא בְיִזְרְעֶאל, כִּי הַמַּכִּים אֲשֶׁר הִכֻּהוּ בָרָמָה, בְּהִלָּחֲמוֹ, אֶת-חֲזָהאֵל מֶלֶךְ אֲרָם; וַעֲזַרְיָהוּ בֶן-יְהוֹרָם מֶלֶךְ יְהוּדָה, יָרַד לִרְאוֹת אֶת-יְהוֹרָם בֶּן-אַחְאָב בְּיִזְרְעֶאל--כִּי-חֹלֶה הוּא. | And he returned to be healed in Jezreel of the wounds which they had given him at Ramah, when he fought against Hazael king of Aram. And Azariah the son of Jehoram king of Judah went down to see Jehoram the son of Ahab in Jezreel, because he was sick.

text_he: ויאמר דויד לשלמה בנו (בני)--אני היה עם-לבי לבנות בית לשם יהוה אלהי | And David said to Solomon 'My son as for me it was in my heart to build a house unto the name of the LORD my God | ומאלהים היתה תבוסת אחזיהו לבוא אל-יורם ובאו יצא עם-יהורם אל-יהוא בן-נמשי אשר משחו יהוה להכרית את-בית אחאב | Now the downfall of Ahaziah was of God in that he went unto Joram for when he was come he went out with Jehoram against Jehu the son of Nimshi whom the LORD had anointed to cut off the house of Ahab
text_en: And David said to Solomon: 'My son, as for me, it was in my heart to build a house unto the name of the LORD my God.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִיד, לִשְׁלֹמֹה: בנו (בְּנִי)--אֲנִי הָיָה עִם-לְבָבִי, לִבְנוֹת בַּיִת לְשֵׁם יְהוָה אֱלֹהָי. | And David said to Solomon: 'My son, as for me, it was in my heart to build a house unto the name of the LORD my God. | וּמֵאֱלֹהִים, הָיְתָה תְּבוּסַת אֲחַזְיָהוּ, לָבוֹא, אֶל-יוֹרָם; וּבְבֹאוֹ, יָצָא עִם-יְהוֹרָם אֶל-יֵהוּא בֶן-נִמְשִׁי, אֲשֶׁר מְשָׁחוֹ יְהוָה, לְהַכְרִית אֶת-בֵּית אַחְאָב. | Now the downfall of Ahaziah was of God, in that he went unto Joram; for when he was come, he went out with Jehoram against Jehu the son of Nimshi, whom the LORD had anointed to cut off the house of Ahab.

text_he: ויהי עלי דבר-יהוה לאמר דם לרב שפכת ומלחמות גדלות עשית לא-תבנה בית לשמי--כי דמים רבים שפכת ארצה לפני | But the word of the LORD came to me saying Thou hast shed blood abundantly and hast made great wars thou shalt not build a house unto My name because thou hast shed much blood upon the earth in My sight | ויהי כהשפט יהוא עם-בית אחאב וימצא את-שרי יהודה ובני אחי אחזיהו משרתים לאחזיהו--ויהרגם | And it came to pass when Jehu was executing judgment upon the house of Ahab that he found the princes of Judah and the sons of the brethren of Ahaziah ministering to Ahaziah and slew them
text_en: But the word of the LORD came to me, saying: Thou hast shed blood abundantly, and hast made great wars; thou shalt not build a house unto My name, because thou hast shed much blood upon the earth in My sight.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי עָלַי דְּבַר-יְהוָה, לֵאמֹר, דָּם לָרֹב שָׁפַכְתָּ, וּמִלְחָמוֹת גְּדֹלוֹת עָשִׂיתָ: לֹא-תִבְנֶה בַיִת, לִשְׁמִי--כִּי דָּמִים רַבִּים, שָׁפַכְתָּ אַרְצָה לְפָנָי. | But the word of the LORD came to me, saying: Thou hast shed blood abundantly, and hast made great wars; thou shalt not build a house unto My name, because thou hast shed much blood upon the earth in My sight. | וַיְהִי, כְּהִשָּׁפֵט יֵהוּא עִם-בֵּית אַחְאָב; וַיִּמְצָא אֶת-שָׂרֵי יְהוּדָה וּבְנֵי אֲחֵי אֲחַזְיָהוּ, מְשָׁרְתִים לַאֲחַזְיָהוּ--וַיַּהַרְגֵם. | And it came to pass, when Jehu was executing judgment upon the house of Ahab, that he found the princes of Judah, and the sons of the brethren of Ahaziah, ministering to Ahaziah, and slew them.

text_he: הנה-בן נולד לך הוא יהיה איש מנוחה והניחותי לו מכל-אויביו מסביב כי שלמה יהיה שמו ושלום ושקט אתן על-ישראל בימיו | Behold a son shall be born to thee who shall be a man of rest and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about for his name shall be Solomon and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days | ויבקש את-אחזיהו וילכדהו והוא מתחבא בשמרון ויבאהו אל-יהוא וימיתהו ויקברהו כי אמרו בן-יהושפט הוא אשר-דרש את-יהוה בכל-לבו ואין לבית אחזיהו לעצר כח למלכה | And he sought Ahaziah and they caught him--now he was hiding in Samaria--and they brought him to Jehu and slew him and they buried him for they said 'He is the son of Jehoshaphat who sought the LORD with all his heart' And there was none of the house of Ahaziah that had power to hold the kingdom
text_en: Behold, a son shall be born to thee, who shall be a man of rest; and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about; for his name shall be Solomon, and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days.
text_pisuk: הִנֵּה-בֵן נוֹלָד לָךְ, הוּא יִהְיֶה אִישׁ מְנוּחָה, וַהֲנִיחוֹתִי לוֹ מִכָּל-אוֹיְבָיו, מִסָּבִיב: כִּי שְׁלֹמֹה יִהְיֶה שְׁמוֹ, וְשָׁלוֹם וָשֶׁקֶט אֶתֵּן עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּיָמָיו. | Behold, a son shall be born to thee, who shall be a man of rest; and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about; for his name shall be Solomon, and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days. | וַיְבַקֵּשׁ אֶת-אֲחַזְיָהוּ וַיִּלְכְּדֻהוּ וְהוּא מִתְחַבֵּא בְשֹׁמְרוֹן, וַיְבִאֻהוּ אֶל-יֵהוּא וַיְמִיתֻהוּ, וַיִּקְבְּרֻהוּ, כִּי אָמְרוּ בֶּן-יְהוֹשָׁפָט הוּא אֲשֶׁר-דָּרַשׁ אֶת-יְהוָה בְּכָל-לְבָבוֹ; וְאֵין לְבֵית אֲחַזְיָהוּ, לַעְצֹר כֹּחַ לְמַמְלָכָה. | And he sought Ahaziah, and they caught him--now he was hiding in Samaria--and they brought him to Jehu, and slew him; and they buried him, for they said: 'He is the son of Jehoshaphat, who sought the LORD with all his heart.' And there was none of the house of Ahaziah that had power to hold the kingdom.

text_he: הוא-יבנה בית לשמי והוא יהיה-לי לבן ואני-לו לאב והכינותי כסא מלכותו על-ישראל--עד-עולם | He shall build a house for My name and he shall be to Me for a son and I will be to him for a father and I will establish the throne of his kingdom over Israel for ever | ועתליהו אם אחזיהו ראתה כי מת בנה ותקם ותדבר את-כל-זרע המלכה--לבית יהודה | Now when Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead she arose and destroyed all the seed royal of the house of Judah
text_en: He shall build a house for My name; and he shall be to Me for a son, and I will be to him for a father; and I will establish the throne of his kingdom over Israel for ever.
text_pisuk: הוּא-יִבְנֶה בַיִת, לִשְׁמִי, וְהוּא יִהְיֶה-לִּי לְבֵן, וַאֲנִי-לוֹ לְאָב; וַהֲכִינוֹתִי כִּסֵּא מַלְכוּתוֹ, עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל--עַד-עוֹלָם. | He shall build a house for My name; and he shall be to Me for a son, and I will be to him for a father; and I will establish the throne of his kingdom over Israel for ever. | וַעֲתַלְיָהוּ אֵם אֲחַזְיָהוּ, רָאֲתָה כִּי מֵת בְּנָהּ; וַתָּקָם, וַתְּדַבֵּר אֶת-כָּל-זֶרַע הַמַּמְלָכָה--לְבֵית יְהוּדָה. | Now when Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she arose and destroyed all the seed royal of the house of Judah.

text_he: עתה בני יהי יהוה עמך והצלחת ובנית בית יהוה אלהיך כאשר דבר עליך | Now my son the LORD be with thee and prosper thou and build the house of the LORD thy God as He hath spoken concerning thee | ותקח יהושבעת בת-המלך את-יואש בן-אחזיהו ותגנב אתו מתוך בני-המלך המומתים ותן אתו ואת-מינקתו בחדר המטות ותסתירהו יהושבעת בת-המלך יהורם אשת יהוידע הכהן כי היא היתה אחות אחזיהו מפני עתליהו--ולא המיתהו | But Jehoshabeath the daughter of the king took Joash the son of Ahaziah and stole him away from among the king's sons that were slain and put him and his nurse in the bed-chamber So Jehoshabeath the daughter of king Jehoram the wife of Jehoiada the priest--for she was the sister of Ahaziah--hid him from Athaliah so that she slew him not
text_en: Now, my son, the LORD be with thee; and prosper thou, and build the house of the LORD thy God, as He hath spoken concerning thee.
text_pisuk: עַתָּה בְנִי, יְהִי יְהוָה עִמָּךְ; וְהִצְלַחְתָּ, וּבָנִיתָ בֵּית יְהוָה אֱלֹהֶיךָ, כַּאֲשֶׁר, דִּבֶּר עָלֶיךָ. | Now, my son, the LORD be with thee; and prosper thou, and build the house of the LORD thy God, as He hath spoken concerning thee. | וַתִּקַּח יְהוֹשַׁבְעַת בַּת-הַמֶּלֶךְ אֶת-יוֹאָשׁ בֶּן-אֲחַזְיָהוּ, וַתִּגְנֹב אֹתוֹ מִתּוֹךְ בְּנֵי-הַמֶּלֶךְ הַמּוּמָתִים, וַתִּתֵּן אֹתוֹ וְאֶת-מֵינִקְתּוֹ, בַּחֲדַר הַמִּטּוֹת; וַתַּסְתִּירֵהוּ יְהוֹשַׁבְעַת בַּת-הַמֶּלֶךְ יְהוֹרָם אֵשֶׁת יְהוֹיָדָע הַכֹּהֵן כִּי הִיא הָיְתָה אֲחוֹת אֲחַזְיָהוּ, מִפְּנֵי עֲתַלְיָהוּ--וְלֹא הֱמִיתָתְהוּ. | But Jehoshabeath, the daughter of the king, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him away from among the king's sons that were slain, and put him and his nurse in the bed-chamber. So Jehoshabeath, the daughter of king Jehoram, the wife of Jehoiada the priest--for she was the sister of Ahaziah--hid him from Athaliah, so that she slew him not.

text_he: אך יתן-לך יהוה שכל ובינה ויצוך על-ישראל ולשמור את-תורת יהוה אלהיך | Only the LORD give thee discretion and understanding and give thee charge concerning Israel that so thou mayest keep the law of the LORD thy God | ויהי אתם בית האלהים מתחבא ש שנים ועתליה מלכת על-הארץ | And he was with them hid in the house of God six years and Athaliah reigned over the land
text_en: Only the LORD give thee discretion and understanding, and give thee charge concerning Israel; that so thou mayest keep the law of the LORD thy God.
text_pisuk: אַךְ יִתֶּן-לְךָ יְהוָה שֵׂכֶל וּבִינָה, וִיצַוְּךָ עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְלִשְׁמוֹר, אֶת-תּוֹרַת יְהוָה אֱלֹהֶיךָ. | Only the LORD give thee discretion and understanding, and give thee charge concerning Israel; that so thou mayest keep the law of the LORD thy God. | וַיְהִי אִתָּם בְּבֵית הָאֱלֹהִים, מִתְחַבֵּא שֵׁשׁ שָׁנִים; וַעֲתַלְיָה, מֹלֶכֶת עַל-הָאָרֶץ. | And he was with them hid in the house of God six years; and Athaliah reigned over the land.

text_he: אז תצליח--אם-תשמור לעשות את-החקים ואת-המשפטים אשר צוה יהוה את-משה על-ישראל חזק ואמץ אל-תירא ואל-תחת
text_en: Then shalt thou prosper, if thou observe to do the statutes and the ordinances which the LORD charged Moses with concerning Israel; be strong, and of good courage; fear not, neither be dismayed.
text_pisuk: אָז תַּצְלִיחַ--אִם-תִּשְׁמוֹר לַעֲשׂוֹת אֶת-הַחֻקִּים וְאֶת-הַמִּשְׁפָּטִים, אֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת-מֹשֶׁה עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל; חֲזַק וֶאֱמָץ, אַל-תִּירָא וְאַל-תֵּחָת.

text_he: והנה בעני הכינותי לבית-יהוה זהב כרים מאה-אלף וכסף אלף אלפים כרים ולנחשת ולברזל אין משקל כי לרב היה ועצים ואבנים הכינותי ועליהם תוסיף
text_en: Now, behold, in my straits I have prepared for the house of the LORD a hundred thousand talents of gold, and a thousand thousand talents of silver; and of brass and iron without weight, for it is in abundance; timber also and stone have I prepared; and thou mayest add thereto.
text_pisuk: וְהִנֵּה בְעָנְיִי הֲכִינוֹתִי לְבֵית-יְהוָה, זָהָב כִּכָּרִים מֵאָה-אֶלֶף וְכֶסֶף אֶלֶף אֲלָפִים כִּכָּרִים, וְלַנְּחֹשֶׁת וְלַבַּרְזֶל אֵין מִשְׁקָל, כִּי לָרֹב הָיָה; וְעֵצִים וַאֲבָנִים הֲכִינוֹתִי, וַעֲלֵיהֶם תּוֹסִיף.

text_he: ועמך לרב עשי מלאכה--חצבים וחרשי אבן ועץ וכל-חכם בכל-מלאכה
text_en: Moreover there are workmen with thee in abundance, hewers and workers of stone and timber, and all men that are skilful in any manner of work;
text_pisuk: וְעִמְּךָ לָרֹב, עֹשֵׂי מְלָאכָה--חֹצְבִים, וְחָרָשֵׁי אֶבֶן וָעֵץ; וְכָל-חָכָם, בְּכָל-מְלָאכָה.

text_he: לזהב לכסף ולנחשת ולברזל אין מספר קום ועשה ויהי יהוה עמך
text_en: of the gold, the silver, and the brass, and the iron, there is no number. Arise and be doing, and the LORD be with thee.'
text_pisuk: לַזָּהָב לַכֶּסֶף וְלַנְּחֹשֶׁת וְלַבַּרְזֶל, אֵין מִסְפָּר; קוּם וַעֲשֵׂה, וִיהִי יְהוָה עִמָּךְ.

text_he: ויצו דויד לכל-שרי ישראל לעזר לשלמה בנו
text_en: David also commanded all the princes of Israel to help Solomon his son:{S}
text_pisuk: וַיְצַו דָּוִיד לְכָל-שָׂרֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, לַעְזֹר לִשְׁלֹמֹה בְנוֹ.

text_he: הלא יהוה אלהיכם עמכם והניח לכם מסביב כי נתן בידי את ישבי הארץ ונכבשה הארץ לפני יהוה ולפני עמו
text_en: 'Is not the LORD your God with you? and hath He not given you rest on every side? for He hath delivered the inhabitants of the land into my hand; and the land is subdued before the LORD, and before His people.
text_pisuk: הֲלֹא יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם עִמָּכֶם, וְהֵנִיחַ לָכֶם מִסָּבִיב: כִּי נָתַן בְּיָדִי, אֵת יֹשְׁבֵי הָאָרֶץ, וְנִכְבְּשָׁה הָאָרֶץ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה, וְלִפְנֵי עַמּוֹ.

text_he: עתה תנו לבכם ונפשכם לדרוש ליהוה אלהיכם וקומו ובנו את-מקדש יהוה האלהים להביא את-ארון ברית-יהוה וכלי קדש האלהים לבית הנבנה לשם-יהוה
text_en: Now set your heart and your soul to seek after the LORD your God; arise therefore, and build ye the sanctuary of the LORD God, to bring the ark of the covenant of the LORD, and the holy vessels of God, into the house that is to be built to the name of the LORD.'
text_pisuk: עַתָּה, תְּנוּ לְבַבְכֶם וְנַפְשְׁכֶם, לִדְרוֹשׁ, לַיהוָה אֱלֹהֵיכֶם; וְקוּמוּ, וּבְנוּ אֶת-מִקְדַּשׁ יְהוָה הָאֱלֹהִים, לְהָבִיא אֶת-אֲרוֹן בְּרִית-יְהוָה וּכְלֵי קֹדֶשׁ הָאֱלֹהִים, לַבַּיִת הַנִּבְנֶה לְשֵׁם-יְהוָה.

text_he: ודויד זקן ושבע ימים וימלך את-שלמה בנו על-ישראל | Now David was old and full of days and he made Solomon his son king over Israel | ובשנה השבעית התחזק יהוידע ויקח את-שרי המאות לעזריהו בן-ירחם ולישמעאל בן-יהוחנן ולעזריהו בן-עובד ואת-מעשיהו בן-עדיהו ואת-אלישפט בן-זכרי--עמו ברית | And in the seventh year Jehoiada strengthened himself and took the captains of hundreds Azariah the son of Jeroham and Ishmael the son of Jehohanan and Azariah the son of Obed and Maaseiah the son of Adaiah and Elishaphat the son of Zichri into covenant with him
text_en: Now David was old and full of days; and he made Solomon his son king over Israel.
text_pisuk: וְדָוִיד זָקֵן, וְשָׂבַע יָמִים; וַיַּמְלֵךְ אֶת-שְׁלֹמֹה בְנוֹ, עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל. | Now David was old and full of days; and he made Solomon his son king over Israel. | וּבַשָּׁנָה הַשְּׁבִעִית הִתְחַזַּק יְהוֹיָדָע, וַיִּקַּח אֶת-שָׂרֵי הַמֵּאוֹת לַעֲזַרְיָהוּ בֶן-יְרֹחָם וּלְיִשְׁמָעֵאל בֶּן-יְהוֹחָנָן וְלַעֲזַרְיָהוּ בֶן-עוֹבֵד וְאֶת-מַעֲשֵׂיָהוּ בֶן-עֲדָיָהוּ וְאֶת-אֱלִישָׁפָט בֶּן-זִכְרִי--עִמּוֹ בַבְּרִית. | And in the seventh year Jehoiada strengthened himself, and took the captains of hundreds, Azariah the son of Jeroham, and Ishmael the son of Jehohanan, and Azariah the son of Obed, and Maaseiah the son of Adaiah, and Elishaphat the son of Zichri, into covenant with him.

text_he: ויאסף את-כל-שרי ישראל והכהנים והלוים | And he gathered together all the princes of Israel with the priests and the Levites | ויסבו ביהודה ויקבצו את-הלוים מכל-ערי יהודה וראשי האבות לישראל ויבאו אל-ירושלם | And they went about in Judah and gathered the Levites out of all the cities of Judah and the heads of fathers' houses of Israel and they came to Jerusalem
text_en: And he gathered together all the princes of Israel, with the priests and the Levites.
text_pisuk: וַיֶּאֱסֹף אֶת-כָּל-שָׂרֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְהַכֹּהֲנִים וְהַלְוִיִּם. | And he gathered together all the princes of Israel, with the priests and the Levites. | וַיָּסֹבּוּ, בִּיהוּדָה, וַיִּקְבְּצוּ אֶת-הַלְוִיִּם מִכָּל-עָרֵי יְהוּדָה, וְרָאשֵׁי הָאָבוֹת לְיִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיָּבֹאוּ, אֶל-יְרוּשָׁלִָם. | And they went about in Judah, and gathered the Levites out of all the cities of Judah, and the heads of fathers' houses of Israel, and they came to Jerusalem.

text_he: ויספרו הלוים מבן שלשים שנה ומעלה ויהי מספרם לגלגלתם לגברים שלשים ושמונה אלף | And the Levites were numbered from thirty years old and upward and their number by their polls man by man was thirty and eight thousand | ויכרת כל-הקהל ברית בית האלהים עם-המלך ויאמר להם הנה בן-המלך ימלך כאשר דבר יהוה על-בני דויד | And all the congregation made a covenant with the king in the house of God And he said unto them 'Behold the king's son shall reign as the LORD hath spoken concerning the sons of David
text_en: And the Levites were numbered from thirty years old and upward; and their number by their polls, man by man, was thirty and eight thousand.
text_pisuk: וַיִּסָּפְרוּ, הַלְוִיִּם, מִבֶּן שְׁלֹשִׁים שָׁנָה, וָמָעְלָה; וַיְהִי מִסְפָּרָם לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָם לִגְבָרִים, שְׁלֹשִׁים וּשְׁמוֹנָה אָלֶף. | And the Levites were numbered from thirty years old and upward; and their number by their polls, man by man, was thirty and eight thousand. | וַיִּכְרֹת כָּל-הַקָּהָל בְּרִית בְּבֵית הָאֱלֹהִים, עִם-הַמֶּלֶךְ; וַיֹּאמֶר לָהֶם, הִנֵּה בֶן-הַמֶּלֶךְ יִמְלֹךְ, כַּאֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר יְהוָה, עַל-בְּנֵי דָוִיד. | And all the congregation made a covenant with the king in the house of God. And he said unto them: 'Behold, the king's son shall reign, as the LORD hath spoken concerning the sons of David.

text_he: מאלה לנצח על-מלאכת בית-יהוה עשרים וארבעה אלף ושטרים ושפטים שת אלפים | Of these twenty and four thousand were to oversee the work of the house of the LORD and six thousand were officers and judges | זה הדבר אשר תעשו השלשית מכם באי השבת לכהנים ולוים לשערי הספים | This is the thing that ye shall do a third part of you that come in on the sabbath of the priests and of the Levites shall be porters of the doors
text_en: Of these, twenty and four thousand were to oversee the work of the house of the LORD; and six thousand were officers and judges;
text_pisuk: מֵאֵלֶּה, לְנַצֵּחַ עַל-מְלֶאכֶת בֵּית-יְהוָה, עֶשְׂרִים וְאַרְבָּעָה, אָלֶף; וְשֹׁטְרִים וְשֹׁפְטִים, שֵׁשֶׁת אֲלָפִים. | Of these, twenty and four thousand were to oversee the work of the house of the LORD; and six thousand were officers and judges; | זֶה הַדָּבָר, אֲשֶׁר תַּעֲשׂוּ: הַשְּׁלִשִׁית מִכֶּם בָּאֵי הַשַּׁבָּת, לַכֹּהֲנִים וְלַלְוִיִּם, לְשֹׁעֲרֵי, הַסִּפִּים. | This is the thing that ye shall do: a third part of you, that come in on the sabbath, of the priests and of the Levites, shall be porters of the doors;

text_he: וארבעת אלפים שערים וארבעת אלפים מהלים ליהוה בכלים אשר עשיתי להל | and four thousand were doorkeepers and four thousand praised the LORD 'with the instruments which I made to praise therewith'{S} | והשלשית בית המלך והשלשית בשער היסוד וכל-העם--בחצרות בית יהוה | and a third part shall be at the king's house and a third part at the gate of the foundation and all the people shall be in the courts of the house of the LORD
text_en: and four thousand were doorkeepers; and four thousand praised the LORD 'with the instruments which I made to praise therewith.'{S}
text_pisuk: וְאַרְבַּעַת אֲלָפִים, שֹׁעֲרִים; וְאַרְבַּעַת אֲלָפִים, מְהַלְלִים לַיהוָה, בַּכֵּלִים, אֲשֶׁר עָשִׂיתִי לְהַלֵּל. | and four thousand were doorkeepers; and four thousand praised the LORD 'with the instruments which I made to praise therewith.'{S} | וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית בְּבֵית הַמֶּלֶךְ, וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית בְּשַׁעַר הַיְסוֹד; וְכָל-הָעָם--בְּחַצְרוֹת, בֵּית יְהוָה. | and a third part shall be at the king's house; and a third part at the gate of the foundation; and all the people shall be in the courts of the house of the LORD.

text_he: ויחלקם דויד מחלקות לבני לוי לגרשון קהת ומרי | And David divided them into courses{S}according to the sons of Levi Gershon Kohath and Merari{S} | ואל-יבוא בית-יהוה כי אם-הכהנים והמשרתים לוים--המה יבאו כי-קדש המה וכל-העם--ישמרו משמרת יהוה | But let none come into the house of the LORD save the priests and they that minister of the Levites they shall come in for they are holy but all the people shall keep the charge of the LORD
text_en: And David divided them into courses{S}according to the sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיֶּחָלְקֵם דָּוִיד, מַחְלְקוֹת;  לִבְנֵי לֵוִי, לְגֵרְשׁוֹן קְהָת וּמְרָרִי. | And David divided them into courses{S}according to the sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.{S} | וְאַל-יָבוֹא בֵית-יְהוָה, כִּי אִם-הַכֹּהֲנִים וְהַמְשָׁרְתִים לַלְוִיִּם--הֵמָּה יָבֹאוּ, כִּי-קֹדֶשׁ הֵמָּה; וְכָל-הָעָם--יִשְׁמְרוּ, מִשְׁמֶרֶת יְהוָה. | But let none come into the house of the LORD, save the priests, and they that minister of the Levites; they shall come in, for they are holy; but all the people shall keep the charge of the LORD.

text_he: לגרשני לעדן ושמעי | Of the Gershonites Ladan and Shimei{S} | והקיפו הלוים את-המלך סביב איש וכליו בידו והבא אל-הבית יומת והיו את-המלך באו ובצאתו | And the Levites shall compass the king round about every man with his weapons in his hand and whosoever cometh into the house let him be slain and be ye with the king when he cometh in and when he goeth out'
text_en: Of the Gershonites: Ladan, and Shimei.{S}
text_pisuk: לַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּי, לַעְדָּן וְשִׁמְעִי. | Of the Gershonites: Ladan, and Shimei.{S} | וְהִקִּיפוּ הַלְוִיִּם אֶת-הַמֶּלֶךְ סָבִיב, אִישׁ וְכֵלָיו בְּיָדוֹ, וְהַבָּא אֶל-הַבַּיִת, יוּמָת; וִהְיוּ אֶת-הַמֶּלֶךְ, בְּבֹאוֹ וּבְצֵאתוֹ. | And the Levites shall compass the king round about, every man with his weapons in his hand; and whosoever cometh into the house, let him be slain; and be ye with the king when he cometh in, and when he goeth out.'

text_he: בני לעדן הראש יחיאל וזתם ויואל--שלשה | The sons of Ladan Jehiel the chief and Zetham and Joel three{S} | ויעשו הלוים וכל-יהודה כל אשר-צוה יהוידע הכהן ויקחו איש את-אנשיו באי השבת עם יוצאי השבת כי לא פטר יהוידע הכהן את-המחלקות | So the Levites and all Judah did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded and they took every man his men those that were to come in on the sabbath with those that were to go out on the sabbath for Jehoiada the priest dismissed not the courses
text_en: The sons of Ladan: Jehiel the chief, and Zetham, and Joel, three.{S}
text_pisuk: בְּנֵי לַעְדָּן, הָרֹאשׁ יְחִיאֵל וְזֵתָם וְיוֹאֵל--שְׁלֹשָׁה. | The sons of Ladan: Jehiel the chief, and Zetham, and Joel, three.{S} | וַיַּעֲשׂוּ הַלְוִיִּם וְכָל-יְהוּדָה, כְּכֹל אֲשֶׁר-צִוָּה יְהוֹיָדָע הַכֹּהֵן, וַיִּקְחוּ אִישׁ אֶת-אֲנָשָׁיו, בָּאֵי הַשַּׁבָּת עִם יוֹצְאֵי הַשַּׁבָּת: כִּי לֹא פָטַר יְהוֹיָדָע הַכֹּהֵן, אֶת-הַמַּחְלְקוֹת. | So the Levites and all Judah did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded; and they took every man his men, those that were to come in on the sabbath, with those that were to go out on the sabbath; for Jehoiada the priest dismissed not the courses.

text_he: בני שמעי שלמות (שלמית) וחזיאל והרן--שלשה אלה ראשי האבות לעדן | The sons of Shimei Shelomith and Haziel and Haran three These were the heads of the fathers' houses of Ladan{S} | ויתן יהוידע הכהן לשרי המאות את-החניתים ואת-המגנות ואת-השלטים אשר למלך דויד--אשר בית האלהים | And Jehoiada the priest delivered to the captains of hundreds the spears and bucklers and shields that had been king David's which were in the house of God
text_en: The sons of Shimei: Shelomith, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These were the heads of the fathers' houses of Ladan.{S}
text_pisuk: בְּנֵי שִׁמְעִי, שלמות (שְׁלֹמִית) וַחֲזִיאֵל וְהָרָן--שְׁלֹשָׁה; אֵלֶּה רָאשֵׁי הָאָבוֹת, לְלַעְדָּן. | The sons of Shimei: Shelomith, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These were the heads of the fathers' houses of Ladan.{S} | וַיִּתֵּן יְהוֹיָדָע הַכֹּהֵן לְשָׂרֵי הַמֵּאוֹת, אֶת-הַחֲנִיתִים וְאֶת-הַמָּגִנּוֹת וְאֶת-הַשְּׁלָטִים, אֲשֶׁר, לַמֶּלֶךְ דָּוִיד--אֲשֶׁר, בֵּית הָאֱלֹהִים. | And Jehoiada the priest delivered to the captains of hundreds the spears, and bucklers, and shields, that had been king David's, which were in the house of God.

text_he: ובני שמעי--יחת זינא ויעוש ובריעה אלה בני-שמעי ארבעה | And the sons of Shimei Jahath Zina and Jeush and Beriah These four were the sons of Shimei | ויעמד את-כל-העם ואיש שלחו בידו מכתף הבית הימנית עד-כתף הבית השמאלית למזבח ולבית--על-המלך סביב | And he set all the people every man with his weapon in his hand from the right side of the house to the left side of the house along by the altar and the house by the king round about
text_en: And the sons of Shimei: Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the sons of Shimei.
text_pisuk: וּבְנֵי שִׁמְעִי--יַחַת זִינָא, וִיעוּשׁ וּבְרִיעָה; אֵלֶּה בְנֵי-שִׁמְעִי, אַרְבָּעָה. | And the sons of Shimei: Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the sons of Shimei. | וַיַּעֲמֵד אֶת-כָּל-הָעָם וְאִישׁ שִׁלְחוֹ בְיָדוֹ, מִכֶּתֶף הַבַּיִת הַיְמָנִית עַד-כֶּתֶף הַבַּיִת הַשְּׂמָאלִית, לַמִּזְבֵּחַ, וְלַבָּיִת--עַל-הַמֶּלֶךְ, סָבִיב. | And he set all the people, every man with his weapon in his hand, from the right side of the house to the left side of the house, along by the altar and the house, by the king round about.

text_he: ויהי-יחת הראש וזיזה השני ויעוש ובריעה לא-הרבו בנים ויהיו לבית אב לפקדה אחת | And Jahath was the chief and Zizah the second but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons therefore they became a fathers' house in one reckoning{S} | ויוציאו את-בן-המלך ויתנו עליו את-הנזר ואת-העדות וימליכו אתו וימשחהו יהוידע ובניו ויאמרו יחי המלך | Then they brought out the king's son and put upon him the crown and the insignia and made him king and Jehoiada and his sons anointed him and they said 'Long live the king'{S}
text_en: And Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second; but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons; therefore they became a fathers' house in one reckoning.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי-יַחַת הָרֹאשׁ, וְזִיזָה הַשֵּׁנִי; וִיעוּשׁ וּבְרִיעָה, לֹא-הִרְבּוּ בָנִים, וַיִּהְיוּ לְבֵית אָב, לִפְקֻדָּה אֶחָת. | And Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second; but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons; therefore they became a fathers' house in one reckoning.{S} | וַיּוֹצִיאוּ אֶת-בֶּן-הַמֶּלֶךְ, וַיִּתְּנוּ עָלָיו אֶת-הַנֵּזֶר וְאֶת-הָעֵדוּת, וַיַּמְלִיכוּ, אֹתוֹ; וַיִּמְשָׁחֻהוּ יְהוֹיָדָע וּבָנָיו, וַיֹּאמְרוּ יְחִי הַמֶּלֶךְ. | Then they brought out the king's son, and put upon him the crown and the insignia, and made him king; and Jehoiada and his sons anointed him; and they said: 'Long live the king.'{S}

text_he: בני קהת עמרם יצהר חברון ועזיאל--ארבעה | The sons of Kohath Amram Izhar Hebron and Uzziel four{S} | ותשמע עתליהו את-קול העם הרצים והמהלים את-המלך ותבוא אל-העם בית יהוה | And when Athaliah heard the noise of the people running and praising the king she came to the people into the house of the LORD
text_en: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.{S}
text_pisuk: בְּנֵי קְהָת, עַמְרָם יִצְהָר חֶבְרוֹן וְעֻזִּיאֵל--אַרְבָּעָה. | The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.{S} | וַתִּשְׁמַע עֲתַלְיָהוּ, אֶת-קוֹל הָעָם הָרָצִים, וְהַמְהַלְלִים, אֶת-הַמֶּלֶךְ; וַתָּבוֹא אֶל-הָעָם, בֵּית יְהוָה. | And when Athaliah heard the noise of the people running and praising the king, she came to the people into the house of the LORD;

text_he: בני עמרם אהרן ומשה ויבדל אהרן להקדישו קדש קדשים הוא-ובניו עד-עולם--להקטיר לפני יהוה לשרתו ולברך בשמו עד-עולם | The sons of Amram Aaron and Moses and Aaron was separated that he should be sanctified as most holy he and his sons for ever to offer before the LORD to minister unto Him and to bless in His name for ever | ותרא והנה המלך עומד על-עמודו במבוא והשרים והחצרות על-המלך וכל-עם הארץ שמח ותוקע בחצרות והמשורים בכלי השיר ומודיעים להל ותקרע עתליהו את-בגדיה ותאמר קשר קשר | and she looked and behold the king stood on his platform at the entrance and the captains and the trumpets by the king and all the people of the land rejoiced and blew with trumpets the singers also on instruments of music and led the singing of praise Then Athaliah rent her clothes and said 'Treason treason'{S}
text_en: The sons of Amram: Aaron and Moses; and Aaron was separated, that he should be sanctified as most holy, he and his sons for ever, to offer before the LORD, to minister unto Him, and to bless in His name for ever.
text_pisuk: בְּנֵי עַמְרָם, אַהֲרֹן וּמֹשֶׁה; וַיִּבָּדֵל אַהֲרֹן לְהַקְדִּישׁוֹ קֹדֶשׁ קָדָשִׁים הוּא-וּבָנָיו, עַד-עוֹלָם--לְהַקְטִיר לִפְנֵי יְהוָה לְשָׁרְתוֹ וּלְבָרֵךְ בִּשְׁמוֹ, עַד-עוֹלָם. | The sons of Amram: Aaron and Moses; and Aaron was separated, that he should be sanctified as most holy, he and his sons for ever, to offer before the LORD, to minister unto Him, and to bless in His name for ever. | וַתֵּרֶא וְהִנֵּה הַמֶּלֶךְ עוֹמֵד עַל-עַמּוּדוֹ בַּמָּבוֹא, וְהַשָּׂרִים וְהַחֲצֹצְרוֹת עַל-הַמֶּלֶךְ, וְכָל-עַם הָאָרֶץ שָׂמֵחַ וְתוֹקֵעַ בַּחֲצֹצְרוֹת, וְהַמְשׁוֹרְרִים בִּכְלֵי הַשִּׁיר וּמוֹדִיעִים לְהַלֵּל; וַתִּקְרַע עֲתַלְיָהוּ אֶת-בְּגָדֶיהָ, וַתֹּאמֶר קֶשֶׁר קָשֶׁר. | and she looked, and, behold, the king stood on his platform at the entrance, and the captains and the trumpets by the king; and all the people of the land rejoiced, and blew with trumpets; the singers also on instruments of music, and led the singing of praise. Then Athaliah rent her clothes, and said: 'Treason, treason.'{S}

text_he: ומשה איש האלהים--בניו יקראו על-שבט הלוי | But as for Moses the man of God his sons are named among the tribe of Levi{S} | ויוצא יהוידע הכהן את-שרי המאות פקודי החיל ויאמר אלהם הוציאוה אל-מבית השדרות והבא אחריה יומת בחרב כי אמר הכהן לא תמיתוה בית יהוה | And Jehoiada the priest brought out the captains of hundreds that were set over the host and said unto them 'Have her forth between the ranks and whoso followeth her let him be slain with the sword' for the priest said 'Slay her not in the house of the LORD'
text_en: But as for Moses the man of God, his sons are named among the tribe of Levi.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמֹשֶׁה, אִישׁ הָאֱלֹהִים--בָּנָיו, יִקָּרְאוּ עַל-שֵׁבֶט הַלֵּוִי. | But as for Moses the man of God, his sons are named among the tribe of Levi.{S} | וַיּוֹצֵא יְהוֹיָדָע הַכֹּהֵן אֶת-שָׂרֵי הַמֵּאוֹת פְּקוּדֵי הַחַיִל, וַיֹּאמֶר אֲלֵהֶם הוֹצִיאוּהָ אֶל-מִבֵּית הַשְּׂדֵרוֹת, וְהַבָּא אַחֲרֶיהָ, יוּמַת בֶּחָרֶב: כִּי אָמַר הַכֹּהֵן, לֹא תְמִיתוּהָ בֵּית יְהוָה. | And Jehoiada the priest brought out the captains of hundreds that were set over the host, and said unto them: 'Have her forth between the ranks; and whoso followeth her, let him be slain with the sword'; for the priest said: 'Slay her not in the house of the LORD.'

text_he: בני משה גרשום ואליעזר | The sons of Moses Gershom and Eliezer | וישימו לה ידים ותבוא אל-מבוא שער-הסוסים בית המלך וימיתוה שם | So they made way for her and she went to the entry of the horse gate to the king's house and they slew her there
text_en: The sons of Moses: Gershom, and Eliezer.
text_pisuk: בְּנֵי מֹשֶׁה, גֵּרְשׁוֹם וֶאֱלִיעֶזֶר. | The sons of Moses: Gershom, and Eliezer. | וַיָּשִׂימוּ לָהּ יָדַיִם, וַתָּבוֹא אֶל-מְבוֹא שַׁעַר-הַסּוּסִים בֵּית הַמֶּלֶךְ; וַיְמִיתוּהָ, שָׁם. | So they made way for her; and she went to the entry of the horse gate to the king's house; and they slew her there.

text_he: בני גרשום שבואל הראש | The sons of Gershom Shebuel the chief | ויכרת יהוידע ברית--בינו ובין כל-העם ובין המלך להיות לעם ליהוה | And Jehoiada made a covenant between himself and all the people and the king that they should be the LORD'S people
text_en: The sons of Gershom: Shebuel the chief.
text_pisuk: בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹם, שְׁבוּאֵל הָרֹאשׁ. | The sons of Gershom: Shebuel the chief. | וַיִּכְרֹת יְהוֹיָדָע, בְּרִית--בֵּינוֹ, וּבֵין כָּל-הָעָם וּבֵין הַמֶּלֶךְ: לִהְיוֹת לְעָם, לַיהוָה. | And Jehoiada made a covenant between himself, and all the people, and the king, that they should be the LORD'S people.

text_he: ויהיו בני-אליעזר רחביה הראש ולא-היה לאליעזר בנים אחרים ובני רחביה רבו למעלה | And the sons of Eliezer were Rehabiah the chief And Eliezer had no other sons but the sons of Rehabiah were very many{S} | ויבאו כל-העם בית-הבעל ויתצהו ואת-מזבחתיו ואת-צלמיו שברו ואת מתן כהן הבעל הרגו לפני המזבחות | And all the people went to the house of Baal and broke it down and broke his altars and his images in pieces and slew Mattan the priest of Baal before the altars
text_en: And the sons of Eliezer were: Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had no other sons; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּהְיוּ בְנֵי-אֱלִיעֶזֶר, רְחַבְיָה הָרֹאשׁ; וְלֹא-הָיָה לֶאֱלִיעֶזֶר בָּנִים אֲחֵרִים, וּבְנֵי רְחַבְיָה רָבוּ לְמָעְלָה. | And the sons of Eliezer were: Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had no other sons; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.{S} | וַיָּבֹאוּ כָל-הָעָם בֵּית-הַבַּעַל וַיִּתְּצֻהוּ, וְאֶת-מִזְבְּחֹתָיו וְאֶת-צְלָמָיו שִׁבֵּרוּ; וְאֵת, מַתָּן כֹּהֵן הַבַּעַל, הָרְגוּ, לִפְנֵי הַמִּזְבְּחוֹת. | And all the people went to the house of Baal, and broke it down, and broke his altars and his images in pieces, and slew Mattan the priest of Baal before the altars.

text_he: בני יצהר שלמית הראש | The sons of Izhar Shelomith the chief | וישם יהוידע פקדות בית יהוה ביד הכהנים הלוים אשר חלק דויד על-בית יהוה להעלות עלות יהוה כתוב בתורת משה בשמחה ובשיר--על ידי דויד | And Jehoiada appointed the offices of the house of the LORD under the hand of the priests the Levites whom David had distributed in the house of the LORD to offer the burnt-offerings of the LORD as it is written in the Law of Moses with rejoicing and with singing according to the direction of David
text_en: The sons of Izhar: Shelomith the chief.
